676a9b15b4ba2f4afa04c7ad.description: A case with some common goodies.

676a9b1afe1fc45172014d32.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Common)
676a9b1afe1fc45172014d32.description: A case with some common goodies.

676a9bc6744595610f0ed52e.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Common)
676a9bc6744595610f0ed52e.description: A case with some common goodies.

676a9da81888885b4e008c51.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676a9da81888885b4e008c51.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676a9e46744595610f0ed53f.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676a9e46744595610f0ed53f.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676a9f03744595610f0ed55f.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676a9f03744595610f0ed55f.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676a9fc7a65670a58c084c9e.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676a9fc7a65670a58c084c9e.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676aa016744595610f0ed563.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676aa016744595610f0ed563.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676aa025fe1fc45172014d9f.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676aa025fe1fc45172014d9f.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676aa0f11888885b4e008c8b.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Rare)
676aa0f11888885b4e008c8b.description: A case with some rare goodies.

676aa104fe1fc45172014da3.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa104fe1fc45172014da3.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa29243000db5340061b5.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa29243000db5340061b5.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa30ffe1fc45172014dce.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa30ffe1fc45172014dce.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa37ff90b6f429601afb5.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa37ff90b6f429601afb5.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa3cf7a232aa5c70bda8d.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa3cf7a232aa5c70bda8d.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa3fc20a7cc6f4309e078.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa3fc20a7cc6f4309e078.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676aa450fe1fc45172014df2.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
676aa450fe1fc45172014df2.description: A case with some epic goodies.

676bf44c5539167c3603e869.name: RShG-2 72.5mm rocket launcher
676bf44c5539167c3603e869.description: A single-use 72.5mm rocket-propelled grenade launcher, designed to engage enemy personnel in open terrain, field shelters, and various types of structures. Manufactured by NPO Bazalt.

678f84bb9e85556ca60f0362.name: Tagilla's welding mask "ZABEY"
678f84bb9e85556ca60f0362.description: Judging by this mask, the Labyrinth had severely affected Tagilla's mental state, making him even more unhinged and bloodthirsty. Who thought he could be any more crazy?

678fa929819ddc4c350c0317.name: Valve handwheel
678fa929819ddc4c350c0317.description: A massive handwheel removed from some kind of valve. It must have been used to regulate the water or gas supply in the Knossos underground facilities.

679b944d597ba2ed120c3d3c.name: Last Breath poster
679b944d597ba2ed120c3d3c.description: There's no escape from the Minotaur's grasp. The only thing left to do is to take the last deep breath and hold on as long as possible.

679b946f90622daf9708da6d.name: Final Moment poster
679b946f90622daf9708da6d.description: Looking at this poster, you realize the sheer terror that the Minotaur's victims felt before they died.

679b94734e9ca6b3d80586a7.name: Taurus poster
679b94734e9ca6b3d80586a7.description: This poster embodies the nature of the Minotaur. Brutality, thirst for murder, and blood. Rivers of blood.

679b9477708cfcb2060b9ade.name: Tark Souls poster
679b9477708cfcb2060b9ade.description: This poster shows the Minotaur being slain by a warrior from the Labyrinth. Very few people have witnessed such a scene with their own eyes.

679b9716597ba2ed120c3d3f.name: Knossos LLC facility key
679b9716597ba2ed120c3d3f.description: A worn office door key marked "Knossos LLC". Probably used to open utility rooms or other premises belonging to Knossos.

679b9819a2f2dd4da9023512.name: Labrys access keycard
679b9819a2f2dd4da9023512.description: A keycard to one of Knossos facilities. The design references the Minotaur mythos, but it's somewhat strange there are no Minotaur theme parks in Tarkov.

679b98e429acd1f2f60985a3.name: Container with suspicious substance
679b98e429acd1f2f60985a3.description: A chemical container with a thick, murky liquid inside. Only a lunatic like Sanitar would want to study something like this.

679b992329acd1f2f60985a5.name: Labrys research notes
679b992329acd1f2f60985a5.description: The documents are encrypted, but appear to contain research notes on some kind of technology or weapon. The records mention the name “Item 1156”.

679b998180a165f7a40b4c2c.name: Slaughter videotape
679b998180a165f7a40b4c2c.description: A videotape with traces of blood and the words “Slaughter”. The owner of the tape hardly felt sympathy for his victims.

679b9a1a4e4ed4b3b40ae5c2.name: Knossos senior manager's diary
679b9a1a4e4ed4b3b40ae5c2.description: Meetings, facilities, and other notes from Knossos senior manager are noted in the diary. If you study them, you can get at least a rough summary of the company's facilities.

679b9aa490622daf9708da73.name: VPX Flash Storage Module marked Group #3
679b9aa490622daf9708da73.description: The VPX Flash Storage Module (FSM) provides high-performance, high-capacity, solid-state SATA storage with AES-256 bit encryption using an Application Specific Integrated Circuit (ASIC). Judging by the marking, it contains data on the focus group experiments and research.

679b9cce4e4ed4b3b40ae5c5.name: Nailhead figurine
679b9cce4e4ed4b3b40ae5c5.description: A limited edition Tarko figurine. What's more strange: the pale skin or the nails stuck in his head? It looks like this poor guy has experienced the full spectrum of human pain.

679b9d43597ba2ed120c3d44.name: Petya Crooker figurine
679b9d43597ba2ed120c3d44.description: A limited edition Tarko figurine. A creepy dude with a disfigured face and blades on his arm. Doing Obdolbos would give you nightmares.

679b9d4b3374fb14f40efe6d.name: Count Bloodsucker figurine
679b9d4b3374fb14f40efe6d.description: A limited edition Tarko figurine. Count Bloodsucker wouldn't have lasted more than a couple days in Tarkov. Sucking blood is cool and all, but does it work against flashbangs and .308?

679b9d55708cfcb2060b9ae3.name: Xenoalien figurine
679b9d55708cfcb2060b9ae3.description: A limited edition Tarko figurine. Looks like a monster with a disproportionately elongated head and a double mouth. Totally "Alien" (good one) to the Tarko universe.

679b9d6390622daf9708da76.name: Pointy guy figurine
679b9d6390622daf9708da76.description: A limited edition Tarko figurine. This funny little character is wearing something like a pyramid on his head. A character like this could only exist in a fictional world, along with zombies and other monsters.

679ba90d269ddfea47012159.name: Chained Labrys
679ba90d269ddfea47012159.description: A two-handed axe made out of a sewer hatch... With that weight, a single blow is enough to split a skull, whether the blade is sharp or not.

679baa2c61f588ae2b062a24.name: Key 01
679baa2c61f588ae2b062a24.description: An old key, the markings are unreadable. Could be useful for surviving the Labyrinth.

679baa4f59b8961f370dd683.name: Key 02
679baa4f59b8961f370dd683.description: This key probably opens some kind of an old lock. The number engraving has been practically scratched off. Could be useful for surviving the Labyrinth.

679baa5a59b8961f370dd685.name: Key 03
679baa5a59b8961f370dd685.description: The number engraving is barely recognizable on the weathered metal. Could be useful for surviving the Labyrinth.

679baa9091966fe40408f149.name: Key 04
679baa9091966fe40408f149.description: The engraving on this key is barely readable: it's either the number 4 or the Russian letter Ч. Could be useful for surviving the Labyrinth.

679baace4e9ca6b3d80586b2.name: Observation room key
679baace4e9ca6b3d80586b2.description: A key that opens one of the personnel workstation rooms in the Labyrinth. That room may have something to do with the research that took place in the Labyrinth.

679baae891966fe40408f14c.name: Torture room key
679baae891966fe40408f14c.description: An old key that would be more suitable for a shabby lock on a grate or fence than a modern door.

679bab714e9ca6b3d80586b4.name: Corpse room key
679bab714e9ca6b3d80586b4.description: An old key that has a strong odor of death. Probably opens a morgue or a room where bodies were kept.

679bac1d61f588ae2b062a26.name: Labyrinth key
679bac1d61f588ae2b062a26.description: A key that opens a certain room in the Labyrinth. There's no telling what might be inside.

67a4b71ad3228756b6088ee2.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Smile)
67a4b71ad3228756b6088ee2.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Someone has customized this one to their liking.

67a5c5b6dfdf568c9009af66.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Stop Me)
67a5c5b6dfdf568c9009af66.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Could this writing on it be considered a cry for help?

67a5c5df782ce4655104db14.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Scars)
67a5c5df782ce4655104db14.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Scars or ritual symbols - what it depicts is up to you to determine.

67a5c5f37f52620c5b05b4d6.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Target)
67a5c5f37f52620c5b05b4d6.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. This reinforced mask covers the wearer's face completely. It's unclear who had the idea to paint a target on it, but that sure is pretty ironic.

67a5c6068fcd9fb73f0752cf.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Skull)
67a5c6068fcd9fb73f0752cf.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Some say the skull is a universal symbol that inspires fear and respect in opponents.

67a5c61c7f52620c5b05b4d8.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Demon)
67a5c61c7f52620c5b05b4d8.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. This reinforced mask covers the wearer's face completely. Mom always asked you to smile more, but she hardly expected this.

67a5c657782ce4655104db16.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (El Día de Muertos)
67a5c657782ce4655104db16.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. The drawing is applied with a durable paint for true fans of El Día de Muertos, the Day of the Dead.

67a5f917dfdf568c9009af6b.name: Lower half-mask (MultiCam)
67a5f917dfdf568c9009af6b.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. MultiCam camouflage version.

67a5f94e802d287c670bb966.name: Lower half-mask (Zombie)
67a5f94e802d287c670bb966.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. The zombie print is chosen in hopes of intimidating opponents.

67a5f968fafb8efd440694b6.name: Lower half-mask (Moss)
67a5f968fafb8efd440694b6.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. Moss camouflage version.

67a5f989f7041a25760dda36.name: Lower half-mask (El Día de Muertos)
67a5f989f7041a25760dda36.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. For true fans of El Día de Muertos, the Day of the Dead.

67a5f9a193f7b62b6b0f6576.name: Lower half-mask (Wraith)
67a5f9a193f7b62b6b0f6576.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. The print is chosen in hopes of intimidating opponents.

67a5f9c8fafb8efd440694b8.name: Lower half-mask (Balaclavas Green)
67a5f9c8fafb8efd440694b8.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. The colorful print will highlight your personality.

67a5f9e7f7041a25760dda38.name: Lower half-mask (Balaclavas Red)
67a5f9e7f7041a25760dda38.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. The colorful print will highlight your personality.

67a5fa01fafb8efd440694ba.name: Lower half-mask (Balaclavas White)
67a5fa01fafb8efd440694ba.description: A piece of cloth, typically a bandana, covering the face from nose and below, is the most typical attribute of a street gang member. The colorful print will highlight your personality.

67a9cc9cf05be177170bcd76.name: Balaclava (Green)
67a9cc9cf05be177170bcd76.description: A definitive woolen balaclava is not only a head-warmer but soul-warmer too for anyone who is too modest for public heroic deeds. Vibrant green version.

67a9ccfff05be177170bcd78.name: Balaclava (Scars)
67a9ccfff05be177170bcd78.description: Scars adorn a man, even if they're just on his balaclava.

67a9cd18f05be177170bcd7a.name: Balaclava (Scratches)
67a9cd18f05be177170bcd7a.description: The embroidered scratches on this balaclava refer to the worst fight of your life. Or trying to pet a fussy cat.

67a9cd28cade15e0f00123b6.name: Balaclava (Born to Die)
67a9cd28cade15e0f00123b6.description: With the embroidery on this balaclava, everyone will know your creed.

67a9cd381fb22063280728a6.name: Balaclava (Not Nice)
67a9cd381fb22063280728a6.description: A definitive woolen balaclava is not only a head-warmer but soul-warmer too for anyone who is too modest for public heroic deeds. The letterings add some flavor.

67a9cd55c2a2d940930aec86.name: Balaclava (Yellow)
67a9cd55c2a2d940930aec86.description: Why make face tattoos when you can make them on a mask.

67a9cd6ecade15e0f00123b8.name: Balaclava (Luxury)
67a9cd6ecade15e0f00123b8.description: This balaclava is designed to catch the eye. It's a good thing no one will recognize you with it on.

67a9dc769de6826a650ee066.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Green)
67a9dc769de6826a650ee066.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Green version. Or a Ranger Green version. Or an Olive Drab version. Or a Taiga Green version. Or an Army Green version. Or a Deep Forest Green version.

67a9dc997faa4210bb0807c6.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (SBEU)
67a9dc997faa4210bb0807c6.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Very Stylish version.

67a9dca99de6826a650ee068.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Oak)
67a9dca99de6826a650ee068.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Hunting camo version.

67a9dcbac185de5a4d0c2a06.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Surpat)
67a9dcbac185de5a4d0c2a06.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Surpat camo version.

67a9dccf9de6826a650ee06a.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (DPM Desert)
67a9dccf9de6826a650ee06a.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Desert Disruptive Pattern Material version. Drip? Unlimited.

67a9dce47faa4210bb0807c8.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (MultiCam Tropic)
67a9dce47faa4210bb0807c8.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. MultiCam Tropic version.

67a9dd619de6826a650ee06c.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Tiger Stripe)
67a9dd619de6826a650ee06c.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. Tiger Stripe camouflage version.

67a9e9d04fb4a4a8a00d2826.name: Balaclava (Red Nose)
67a9e9d04fb4a4a8a00d2826.description: A universal balaclava. For those who want to express their individuality and warn both enemies and allies about who you really are.

67a9e9e0c185de5a4d0c2a13.name: Balaclava (Demon)
67a9e9e0c185de5a4d0c2a13.description: A universal balaclava. For the true Japanese warriors.

67a9e9f09de6826a650ee074.name: Balaclava (Skull)
67a9e9f09de6826a650ee074.description: Another balaclava with a skull print for the truest mall ninjas.

67a9ea004fb4a4a8a00d2828.name: Balaclava (Fear)
67a9ea004fb4a4a8a00d2828.description: Express yourself and intimidate your enemies (or make them cringe) with a yet another skull mask.

67a9ea10c185de5a4d0c2a15.name: Balaclava (Yellow Oni)
67a9ea10c185de5a4d0c2a15.description: A balaclava with a yellow Oni print.

67a9ea39de7fb0f19e077da6.name: Balaclava (Red Oni)
67a9ea39de7fb0f19e077da6.description: A balaclava with a red Oni print.

67a9ea7e4fb4a4a8a00d282a.name: Balaclava (White Oni)
67a9ea7e4fb4a4a8a00d282a.description: A balaclava with a white Oni print.

67a9ea98de7fb0f19e077da8.name: Balaclava (Smile)
67a9ea98de7fb0f19e077da8.description: A balaclava with a toothy smile print.

67aaf808bf7609058606a926.name: Neoprene mask (M90 Desert)
67aaf808bf7609058606a926.description: A lightweight neoprene mask. M90 Desert camouflage version.

67aaf82d508ee9b6440e9c46.name: Neoprene mask (Loui Peeton)
67aaf82d508ee9b6440e9c46.description: A lightweight neoprene mask with a luxury design.

67aaf84104dca1c82c071cf6.name: Neoprene mask (Lucha Libre)
67aaf84104dca1c82c071cf6.description: A lightweight neoprene mask with a professional wrestling print.

67aaf851bf7609058606a928.name: Neoprene mask (Zombie)
67aaf851bf7609058606a928.description: A lightweight neoprene mask with a zombie print.

67aaf863de7fb0f19e077db9.name: Neoprene mask (Say Nothing)
67aaf863de7fb0f19e077db9.description: A lightweight neoprene mask with a unique print. The little symbol on the side looks strangely familiar.

67aaf879508ee9b6440e9c48.name: Neoprene mask (ONI)
67aaf879508ee9b6440e9c48.description: A lightweight neoprene mask with an Oni print.

67ab2eecfe82855dcc0f2af6.name: Hexatac HPC Plate Carrier (MultiCam)
67ab2eecfe82855dcc0f2af6.description: A plate carrier by Hexatac. A minimalistic version designed to be used with chest rigs. MultiCam version.

67ab2f28dafe3b22670c9116.name: BNTI Kirasa-N body armor (Green)
67ab2f28dafe3b22670c9116.description: The "Kirasa N" body armor is designed for the army and police special forces of the Russian Federation. The bulletproof vest provides circular protection of the human torso. Elements of the damper provide ventilation of the under armor space and reduce the blunt damage. Green version.

67ab2f5adafe3b22670c911f.name: FORT Redut-M body armor (SK Woodland)
67ab2f5adafe3b22670c911f.description: “Redut-M” is a modified version of the well-proven Redut body armor, which is in service of special units of the FSB. The vest is based on advanced technologies in the field of individual armor. Due to the optimized form of armor elements and the outer cover with a special damping-ventilation system, the Redut M armored vest has excellent functional qualities, which facilitates active actions, including those associated with the use of vehicles and in confined spaces. SK Woodland version.

67ab2f94dafe3b22670c912c.name: HighCom Trooper TFO body armor (Coyote)
67ab2f94dafe3b22670c912c.description: A plate armor vest by HighCom, popular among USEC PMCs. Coyote version.

67ab3d4b83869afd170fdd3f.name: BBQ-S43 gas torch
67ab3d4b83869afd170fdd3f.description: A portable torch with a limited gas supply. This bad boy is unlikely to burn a hole in the wall, but will do the job on a small metal target.

67ab3ea96d7ece17bf0096f6.name: ANA Tactical Alpha chest rig (MultiCam)
67ab3ea96d7ece17bf0096f6.description: "Alpha" is a high-quality chest rig that fully meets the military standards for reliability and functionality. The combination of integrated pouches and MOLLE straps provides the means of carrying a large number of necessary equipment. The vest is designed as a classic chest rig. In this type of vest, all the gear is located in the front and side parts, while the back part is comprised of adjustment belts and straps. Manufactured by ANA Tactical. MultiCam camouflage version.

67ab3f146d7ece17bf0096ff.name: BlackRock chest rig (Khaki)
67ab3f146d7ece17bf0096ff.description: A custom-made chest rig for wearing on top of body armor in urban operations. Sturdy and versatile, it features both MOLLE and ALICE attachment systems. Khaki version.

67ab49aab9c7a1e18c095686.name: Crye Precision AVS plate carrier (MultiCam)
67ab49aab9c7a1e18c095686.description: The Crye Precision AVS plate carrier equipped with Groin Protector and pouches in assault configuration. MultiCam camouflage version.

67ab4b2d6f7ae4aa550bbcf6.name: 5.11 Tactical TacTec plate carrier (Storm)
67ab4b2d6f7ae4aa550bbcf6.description: A plate carrier with a set of pouches for use with assault rifles. Manufactured by 5.11 Tactical. Storm color version.

67af41dd1eb308667602db4a.name: Dundukk sport sunglasses (Orange lenses)
67af41dd1eb308667602db4a.description: Modern sunglasses, made in a sporty style. Great for a stylish shootout at the gas station.

67af425c2676ade5750b50e6.name: RayBench Aviator glasses (Green lenses)
67af425c2676ade5750b50e6.description: Legendary mercenary glasses around the world. Wear them if you want to be cool, like Vovan from the hood.

67af42942676ade5750b50e8.name: Oakley SI M Frame safety glasses (Orange lenses)
67af42942676ade5750b50e8.description: Ballistic glasses with impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses.

67af42b38d9ef5c57e0d5126.name: Round frame sunglasses (Green lenses)
67af42b38d9ef5c57e0d5126.description: Sunglasses with a round-shaped frame. Cool and stylish!

67b49e7335dec48e3e05e057.name: F-1 hand grenade (Reduced delay)
67b49e7335dec48e3e05e057.description: The F-1 hand grenade (GRAU Index 57-G-721) is an anti-personnel fragmentation grenade, designed for neutralizing enemy personnel in defensive combat. This version is personally modified by Partisan and has a shortened fuze, intended for explosive tripwires.

67bde1dc5678472f2a0e6167.name: G-Wagon flash drive
67bde1dc5678472f2a0e6167.description: A flash drive found at the abandoned high-ranking TerraGroup staff's SUV. Contains something important, though it's unclear what exactly.

67bde22566ca1d79a202462f.name: Crashed plane's flight recorder
67bde22566ca1d79a202462f.description: A flight recorder found at the plane that crashed in the Priozersk nature reserve. This device is crucial to figuring out what happened to the plane.

67bde548cf0cc29475092192.name: Elektronik's flash drive
67bde548cf0cc29475092192.description: A flash drive Elektronik used to write the crashed plane crew's conversations. A very valuable piece of intel.

67bde59edb4b617a6c0d69f8.name: Armored case
67bde59edb4b617a6c0d69f8.description: A mysterious briefcase, apparently containing a certain "Ticket" out of Tarkov.

67bdea3ecf0cc29475092196.name: Experimental signal jammer
67bdea3ecf0cc29475092196.description: A device developed by TerraGroup, capable of suppressing digital signals within a 100 meter radius.

67bdf097600629c8f20322e5.name: TerraGroup Labs master keycard
67bdf097600629c8f20322e5.description: A pass card granting access to all doors within the system. Used exclusively inside TerraGroup laboratories.

67c031b79320f644db06f456.name: Blank RFID keycard
67c031b79320f644db06f456.description: A blank access keycard template. It doesn’t open anything, at least not yet.

67c0324acc87f341720274b6.name: RFID keycard encryption device
67c0324acc87f341720274b6.description: A device capable of encrypting RFID card data. Features an integrated microcontroller. Commonly used within TerraGroup facilities.

67c033719dacd7c19f0f9f46.name: Secure container Alpha-1 with TerraGroup evidence
67c033719dacd7c19f0f9f46.description: A small container holding all the documents and audio tapes containing compromising material on TerraGroup. Now they’re guaranteed to reach Mr. Kerman intact.

67c033fd0610e91bea056998.name: Reprogrammed RFID keycard with Mr. Kerman's hash codes
67c033fd0610e91bea056998.description: An RFID keycard reprogrammed using hash codes from Mr. Kerman. Grants access to the port Terminal. At least, it should.

67c0345b354fca26a0008036.name: Flash drive with Mr. Kerman's hash codes
67c0345b354fca26a0008036.description: A flash drive containing updated hash codes for RFID cards. Handed over by a trusted associate of Mr. Kerman.

67c034f0e7a5da1e070f6de8.name: Folder with TerraGroup evidence (Finances)
67c034f0e7a5da1e070f6de8.description: A folder containing documents that compromise TerraGroup, focusing specifically on the organization’s financial activities.

67c035140610e91bea05699a.name: Folder with TerraGroup Labs evidence (Developments)
67c035140610e91bea05699a.description: A folder containing documents that compromise TerraGroup Labs, focusing specifically on the organization’s developments.

67c0351e354fca26a0008038.name: Folder with TerraGroup evidence (Staff)
67c0351e354fca26a0008038.description: A folder containing documents that compromise TerraGroup, focusing specifically on the organization’s staff records.

67c0352dd98287be7b0923d6.name: Folder with TerraGroup Labs evidence (Reports)
67c0352dd98287be7b0923d6.description: A folder containing documents that compromise TerraGroup Labs, focusing specifically on the organization’s project reports.

67c0497068e50a07b10d2576.name: SSD with TerraGroup evidence
67c0497068e50a07b10d2576.description: A solid-state drive containing incriminating material. TerraGroup would likely pay handsomely for one like this. Or maybe others would.

67c049bf6df6ad43b3005fb6.name: Case with dangerous cargo
67c049bf6df6ad43b3005fb6.description: A case found in an unremarkable room. Best left unopened. Or better yet, buried somewhere.

67c04a6f9152fbdfa306cc66.name: Reprogrammed RFID keycard with Prapor's hash codes
67c04a6f9152fbdfa306cc66.description: An RFID keycard reprogrammed using hash codes from Prapor. Grants access to the port Terminal. At least, it should.

67c04a9bd98287be7b0923d8.name: Flash drive with Prapor's hash codes
67c04a9bd98287be7b0923d8.description: A flash drive containing updated hash codes for RFID cards. Handed over by Prapor for a small favor.

67c04b062669b12ac6034866.name: Factory plant topographic intel maps
67c04b062669b12ac6034866.description: Materials that will help you better orient yourself around the area.

67c04b15e7a5da1e070f6dea.name: City topographic intel maps
67c04b15e7a5da1e070f6dea.description: Materials that will help you better orient yourself around the area.

67c04b286df6ad43b3005fb9.name: Customs topographic intel maps
67c04b286df6ad43b3005fb9.description: Materials that will help you better orient yourself around the area.

67c04b351becc43a45071286.name: Nature reserve topographic intel maps
67c04b351becc43a45071286.description: Materials that will help you better orient yourself around the area.

67c04b420610e91bea05699c.name: Lighthouse topographic intel maps
67c04b420610e91bea05699c.description: Materials that will help you better orient yourself around the area.

67c04b8de7a5da1e070f6dec.name: Military flash drive with topographic intel
67c04b8de7a5da1e070f6dec.description: A military flash drive containing the full set of topographic reconnaissance materials. Lucky is the one who gets their hands on it.

67c04c046df6ad43b3005fbb.name: Sacred Amulet
67c04c046df6ad43b3005fbb.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67c04c39354fca26a000803a.name: Sacred Amulet
67c04c39354fca26a000803a.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67c04c429152fbdfa306cc68.name: Sacred Amulet
67c04c429152fbdfa306cc68.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67c04c4d6df6ad43b3005fbd.name: Sacred Amulet
67c04c4d6df6ad43b3005fbd.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67c04c6024431537a80d6106.name: Sacred Amulet
67c04c6024431537a80d6106.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67c04dac9320f644db06f45c.name: RFID keycard with unknown name
67c04dac9320f644db06f45c.description: A personalized RFID card with a strict design. An exact copy of Kruglov’s keycard, but the owner’s name has been deliberately scrubbed off. Grants access to the TerraGroup evacuation point reserved for trusted personnel.

67c540c3d0538d12ec036c08.name: .308 ME
67c540c3d0538d12ec036c08.description: A rifle cartridge developed in 2007 by American companies Marlin Firearms and Hornady for the lever-action hunting rifles Marlin Model 308MX and Marlin Model 308MXLR. It is based on the .307 Winchester and was designed to reproduce that cartridge’s high ballistic performance.

67c540cfb032bbdb530201b8.name: .308 ME LOKT
67c540cfb032bbdb530201b8.description: A .308 Marlin Express cartridge loaded with a soft-point expanding bullet, developed specifically for Marlin MX and MXLR rifles.

67c54114d0538d12ec036c0a.name: MXLR trigger
67c54114d0538d12ec036c0a.description: A standard-issue trigger for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c5411f26265106dd06979a.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision trigger
67c5411f26265106dd06979a.description: An ergonomic trigger for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c5412bb032bbdb530201ba.name: MXLR hammer
67c5412bb032bbdb530201ba.description: A standard-issue hammer for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c5414226265106dd06979c.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision hammer spur extension
67c5414226265106dd06979c.description: An ergonomic hammer extension for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c5414ed0538d12ec036c0c.name: MXLR hammer spur extension
67c5414ed0538d12ec036c0c.description: An ergonomic hammer extension for the Marlin MXLR.

67c54183b032bbdb530201bc.name: MXLR loop lever
67c54183b032bbdb530201bc.description: A standard loop lever for the Marlin MXLR.

67c5418f26265106dd06979e.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision medium loop lever
67c5418f26265106dd06979e.description: An extended loop lever for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c541ba5b84f7f36c03e555.name: MXLR standard stock
67c541ba5b84f7f36c03e555.description: A standard stock for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c541ca26265106dd0697a0.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision aluminum stock
67c541ca26265106dd0697a0.description: An aluminum stock for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c541d45b84f7f36c03e557.name: M1895/MXLR Magpul ELG stock
67c541d45b84f7f36c03e557.description: A polymer stock for M1895 and compatibles. Manufactured by Magpul.

67c541fcb032bbdb530201be.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision RHINO 5 inch scope rail
67c541fcb032bbdb530201be.description: A 5 inch top rail for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Allows installation of various optics. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c54210d0538d12ec036c0e.name: M1895/MXLR XS Marlin Optic Mount
67c54210d0538d12ec036c0e.description: A top rail for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Allows installation of various optics. Manufactured by XS Sights.

67c5422726265106dd0697a2.name: M1895/MXLR XS Marlin Ghost Ring rear sight
67c5422726265106dd0697a2.description: A Ghost Ring type rear sight for M1895 and compatibles. Manufactured by XS Sights.

67c5424826265106dd0697a4.name: MXLR .308 ME 5-round magazine
67c5424826265106dd0697a4.description: A 5-round .308 ME tube magazine for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c5425e26265106dd0697a7.name: MXLR .308 ME 24 inch barrel
67c5425e26265106dd0697a7.description: A 24 inch .308 ME barrel for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c54270b032bbdb530201c2.name: MXLR standard front sight
67c54270b032bbdb530201c2.description: A standard front sight for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c5427eac40c364490664f6.name: M1895/MXLR XS Marlin Ghost front sight
67c5427eac40c364490664f6.description: A Ghost type front sight for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by XS Sights.

67c5428ab032bbdb530201c4.name: MXLR standard rear sight
67c5428ab032bbdb530201c4.description: A standard rear sight for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c5429fac40c364490664f8.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision M-LOK handguard
67c5429fac40c364490664f8.description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c542aeb032bbdb530201c6.name: M1895/MXLR Magpul ELG M-LOK handguard
67c542aeb032bbdb530201c6.description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Magpul.

67c542baac40c36449066500.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision COSTA M-LOK handguard
67c542baac40c36449066500.description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c542c126265106dd0697ab.name: MXLR standard handguard
67c542c126265106dd0697ab.description: A standard handguard for the Marlin MXLR rifle.

67c542ecac40c36449066508.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision COSTA top rail
67c542ecac40c36449066508.description: A top rail for the COSTA handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision.

67c6de3ce39861860909e8e5.name: Marlin MXLR .308 ME lever-action rifle
67c6de3ce39861860909e8e5.description: The classic Marlin 1895 lever-action rifle in the MXLR (Marlin Express LEVERevolution) variant. A modern take on the timeless Henry-style lever-action. Comes in a chrome finish and chambered for the special .308 Marlin Express cartridge.

67cad1ec19b006e9e50f44d6.name: Locked equipment crate (BattlePass 0)
67cad1ec19b006e9e50f44d6.description: A reward for progress in BattlePass Season 0. It contains various equipment to help you survive and kill in the harsh world of Tarkov. But first, you need to find a way to open this box.

67cad3226bf74131800752b7.name: Unlocked equipment crate (BattlePass 0)
67cad3226bf74131800752b7.description: A reward for progress in BattlePass Season 0. It contains various equipment to help you survive and kill in the harsh world of Tarkov. The lock has been crudely broken, which means there are no more obstacles between you and the contents of the box.

67d0576f29f580ebc10efd08.name: TheAKGuy AK-50 .50 BMG anti-materiel rifle
67d0576f29f580ebc10efd08.description: The AK-50 semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle is an experimental first-of-a-kind project that adapts the Kalashnikov platform to use the .50 BMG cartridge. The AK-50 has outstanding penetration and range, making it a very powerful sniper rifle. This prototype was developed by a firearms manufacturer and YouTube blogger Brandon Herrera and co. as part of The AK Guy LTD.

67d2c26a504767dad30a9338.name: Sacred Amulet
67d2c26a504767dad30a9338.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67d2c2aec4d4d19af00f9ba8.name: Sacred Amulet
67d2c2aec4d4d19af00f9ba8.description: A mysterious amulet given to you by Lightkeeper. Serves as a reminder of the wearer's important role in Tarkov's history. Very fragile.

67d3ed3271c17ff82e0a5b0b.name: 열쇠 보관함
67d3ed3271c17ff82e0a5b0b.description: 이 보관함은 창고에서 한 곳에 수많은 열쇠를 보관할 수 있게 도와주어 넘쳐흐르는 열쇠들을 정리할 수 있는 궁극의 해결책입니다.

67d416e19bd76ef20f0e743b.name: AK-50 dust cover
67d416e19bd76ef20f0e743b.description: A receiver dust cover with integrated Picatinny rail for the AK-50, allowing installation of optics. Manufactured by The AK Guy LTD.

67d4178bffb910d21f04720a.name: AK-50 .50 BMG 24 inch barrel
67d4178bffb910d21f04720a.description: A 24 inch (612mm) barrel for the AK-50, manufactured by The AK Guy LTD.

67d417c023ec241bb70d4896.name: AK-50 M-LOK handguard with gas tube
67d417c023ec241bb70d4896.description: A handguard and gas tube for the AK-50. The handguard is equipped with an M-LOK standard interface for attaching additional equipment, and also has Picatinny rail for mounting tactical devices. Manufactured by The AK Guy LTD.

67d41883f378a36c4706eeb7.name: AK-50 .50 BMG muzzle brake
67d41883f378a36c4706eeb7.description: A muzzle brake for the AK-50. Reduces recoil and muzzle rise. Manufactured by The AK Guy LTD.

67d418d0ffb910d21f04720e.name: M82A1 .50 BMG 10-round magazine
67d418d0ffb910d21f04720e.description: A 10-round .50 BMG magazine for the M82A1 sniper rifle, manufactured by Barrett Firearms.

67d41936f378a36c4706eeb9.name: .50 BMG HP
67d41936f378a36c4706eeb9.description: A .50 BMG (12.7x99mm NATO) hollow point cartridge, developed in the USA. The cartridge has significant stopping power and is capable of inflicting devastating damage to the target upon impact, however the hollow point bullet design does not allow it to penetrate armor effectively.

67dc212493ce32834b0fa446.name: .50 BMG M21
67dc212493ce32834b0fa446.description: A .50 BMG (12.7x99mm NATO) M21 "headlight" high-visibility tracer cartridge, developed in the USA and adopted in 1923 for Browning M2 machine guns, primarily designed to destroy light armored vehicles and neutralize enemy personnel behind light cover. The cartridge has significant stopping power and is capable of inflicting devastating damage to the target upon impact.

67dc255ee3028a8b120efc48.name: .50 BMG M33
67dc255ee3028a8b120efc48.description: A .50 BMG (12.7x99mm NATO) M33 Ball cartridge, developed in the USA and adopted in 1923 for Browning M2 machine guns, primarily designed to destroy light armored vehicles and neutralize enemy personnel behind light cover. The cartridge has significant stopping power and is capable of inflicting devastating damage to the target upon impact.

67dc2648ba5b79876906a166.name: .50 BMG M903 SLAP
67dc2648ba5b79876906a166.description: A .50 BMG (12.7x99mm NATO) M903 SLAP (Saboted Light Armor Penetrator) cartridge. Created by placing a 7.62 armor-piercing bullet in a polymer container that separates after leaving the barrel. The cartridge has significant stopping power and is capable of inflicting devastating damage to the target upon impact.

67e183377c6c2011970f3149.name: Ariadne symbol key
67e183377c6c2011970f3149.description: Someone had made a barely visible mark on this key, resembling a ball of thread. Although, it could have simply been left by careless storage.

67ea616a74f765cefd009fb7.name: Tagilla's welding mask "ZABEY" (Replica)
67ea616a74f765cefd009fb7.description: Judging by this mask, the Labyrinth had severely affected Tagilla's mental state, making him even more unhinged and bloodthirsty. Who thought he could be any more crazy? It seems that this is merely a replica and cannot be worn. The mask was probably created as a souvenir, intended to remind survivors of their encounter with a ruthless killer.

67ee7680562d5057e60ccc3a.name: TerraGroup corporate apartment key
67ee7680562d5057e60ccc3a.description: A key found in A.P.'s room. It likely opens one of TerraGroup’s corporate apartments.

67ee77389fcc485cf10615f3.name: Sliderkey flash drive marked with A.P.
67ee77389fcc485cf10615f3.description: A Sliderkey secure flash drive. These drives are commonly used by TerraGroup management. This one appears to have been used by someone with the initials "A.P.".

67f3fd9bdb1fbd5add090f96.name: Recruiter's notes
67f3fd9bdb1fbd5add090f96.description: The journal lists gathering points and routes for transporting people to Scav bases spread throughout the city. According to the instructions for recruiters, a large-scale mercenary recruitment campaign is being prepared in Tarkov.

67f90180f07898267b0a4ed7.name: Arena Cup Series balaclava
67f90180f07898267b0a4ed7.description: A signature balaclava of the famous Tarkov hip-hop artist with the Arena Cup Series tournament insignia. The artist hasn't performed in Tarkov for quite a while, but their merch has found a new life.

67f924a9154a04c33b0a3c57.name: Killa fangirl poster
67f924a9154a04c33b0a3c57.description: This poster shows a Killa fangirl. Despite the scratches on the paper and folding marks, you can tell that the previous owner treasured this poster very much.

67f924adb45d94a2600a8cc8.name: Grenade girl poster
67f924adb45d94a2600a8cc8.description: Women are not usually allowed to join BEAR or USEC. But even though the poster is damaged and the paper is sticky in places, it is obvious that this photo is authentic.

67f924b1b07831a6ef0ce317.name: Unusual leather rig poster
67f924b1b07831a6ef0ce317.description: It seems unlikely that similar pieces of equipment are available in present-day Tarkov. Judging by the condition of the poster, it was obviously made during peacetime.

67ff1e209d1f778973073376.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision trigger (Black)
67ff1e209d1f778973073376.description: An ergonomic trigger for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Black version.

67ff1e2b3e43c3abb701c7c6.description: An ergonomic trigger for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Gold color version.

67ff1eaf8e8db1dcb80ccad8.description: An ergonomic hammer extension for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Black version.

67ff1f9f32abb9a4280b5178.description: An aluminum stock for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Flat Dark Earth version.

67ff1fa88e8db1dcb80ccada.name: M1895/MXLR Ranger Point Precision aluminum stock (Green)
67ff1fa88e8db1dcb80ccada.description: An aluminum stock for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Green version.

67ff24c0abb53266190dfc66.description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Ranger Point Precision. Green version.

67ff26a2abb53266190dfc6c.description: A handguard for M1895 rifles and compatibles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of tactical equipment. Manufactured by Magpul. Flat Dark Earth version.

681096b551511048940afed9.description: A 20 inch handguard for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by BLK LBL. Flat Dark Earth version.

68109a1f327033533604170a.description: A 20 inch handguard for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by BLK LBL. Black version.

68109c867807b4d2dd0b5df5.name: A.P. meeting audio tape Part 1
68109c867807b4d2dd0b5df5.description: A tape from the lecture hall recording one of the TerraGroup meetings.

6810a469f6c2827d680d1f4c.name: MDR BLK LBL ALX 16 handguard (FDE)
6810a469f6c2827d680d1f4c.description: A 16 inch handguard for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by BLK LBL. Flat Dark Earth version.

6810aa1474bf67765c02e91a.name: MDR BLK LBL ALX 16 handguard (Black)
6810aa1474bf67765c02e91a.description: A 16 inch handguard for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by BLK LBL. Black version.

6810ca87002deee76b04970b.name: MDR Micron M-LOK handguard (FDE)
6810ca87002deee76b04970b.description: A PDW handguard with an integrated foregrip for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Desert Tech. Flat Dark Earth version.

6810d2c6485a5ea11b01e3ad.name: MDR 5.56x45 11.5 inch barrel
6810d2c6485a5ea11b01e3ad.description: An 11.5 inch (292mm) barrel for MDR based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

6810d3d8dc7bbeec2f0081c9.name: MDR Micron M-LOK handguard (Black)
6810d3d8dc7bbeec2f0081c9.description: A PDW handguard with an integrated foregrip for MDR assault rifles. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Desert Tech. Black version.

6811e9119b009e592c07a59e.name: Cult victim audio tape #1
6811e9119b009e592c07a59e.description: An audio tape from the apartment of the cult victim. The recording mentions something called the Eye of the World.

6811f4854922782caa087440.name: MCX GEN1 10.5 inch handguard
6811f4854922782caa087440.description: A first-gen 10.5 inch handguard with a proprietary rail attachment system for the MCX assault rifle. Part of the LVAW (Low Visibility Assault Weapon) configuration used by US JSOC units. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.

68120dcbb90552f01004e5ca.name: MCX Lancer Carbon Fiber M-LOK 10.5 inch handguard
68120dcbb90552f01004e5ca.description: A 10.5 inch handguard for the MCX assault rifle, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Lancer Systems.

6812180dc20f5c52bc04d6cc.name: MCX Lancer Carbon Fiber M-LOK 12 inch handguard
6812180dc20f5c52bc04d6cc.description: A 12 inch handguard for the MCX assault rifle, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Lancer Systems.

681236df5cbf0518e00557a0.name: MCX Lancer Carbon Fiber M-LOK 18 inch handguard
681236df5cbf0518e00557a0.description: An 18 inch handguard for the MCX assault rifle, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Lancer Systems.

681245a31eb182c02f0d7f09.name: MCX .300 BLK 16 inch barrel
681245a31eb182c02f0d7f09.description: A 16 inch (406mm) barrel for MCX-based weapons, chambered in .300 BLK.

68124640c5fd00ec0a01a237.name: MCX Cal-X Mid-Piston gas block
68124640c5fd00ec0a01a237.description: A gas block with a medium length piston designed for the MCX assault rifles, manufactured by SIG Sauer.

6819f8df28294ec0730db6b4.name: SZ-1 explosive charge
6819f8df28294ec0730db6b4.description: A demolition charge equipped with an improvised countdown timer, ready for use.

682315b0f8d8f8681e0744b0.name: AK-12 L.A.C. Akvilon-15 handguard
682315b0f8d8f8681e0744b0.description: A free-float handguard for the AK-12 assault rifle. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by L.A.C.

682315bdf8d8f8681e0744b5.name: AK-12 Tactical Ideas N-4 handguard
682315bdf8d8f8681e0744b5.description: A free-float handguard for the AK-12 assault rifle. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional tactical devices and accessories. Manufactured by Tactical Ideas.

682315c58639961c6001dbe7.name: AK-12 Zenit Sport-12 handguard
682315c58639961c6001dbe7.description: A handguard for the AK-12 assault rifle. Manufactured by Zenit.

682315d08639961c6001dbec.name: AK-12 Zenit Sport-12 handguard cover
682315d08639961c6001dbec.description: A handguard cover from the Sport-12 kit for the AK-12 assault rifle. Manufactured by Zenit.

682317390ee6ef08a60e4547.name: Zenit B-2 rail
682317390ee6ef08a60e4547.description: A proprietary rail that allows installation of tactical equipment. Installed on the Basis series interface. Manufactured by Zenit.

682317428639961c6001dbf1.name: Zenit B-2U rail
682317428639961c6001dbf1.description: A proprietary rail that allows installation of tactical equipment. Installed on the Basis series interface. Manufactured by Zenit.

68235b0b7d3ccc3ca20f4d01.name: AK-12 BRT M24 thread muzzle adapter
68235b0b7d3ccc3ca20f4d01.description: A muzzle thread adapter that allows installation of various modern AK 5.45x39 muzzle devices on the bayonet type barrel thread of the AK-12 and its civilian versions. Manufactured by BRT.

68305fdc84a12bb973021fc0.name: RPD DS Arms Railed Handguard
68305fdc84a12bb973021fc0.description: A polymer railed handguard for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.

6830601984a12bb973021fc2.name: RPD 7.62x39 DS Arms 370mm barrel
6830601984a12bb973021fc2.description: A 370mm barrel for the RPD machine gun, custom threaded for .308/7.62x51 muzzle devices.

683060403b1bb49282023611.name: RPD DS Arms buttstock
683060403b1bb49282023611.description: A polymer buttstock for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.

6830606e84a12bb973021fd0.name: RPD 7.62x51 DS Arms Belgian Style Muzzle Brake
6830606e84a12bb973021fd0.description: A Belgian type muzzle brake for the custom threaded .308 barrel for the RPD machine gun. Manufactured by DS Arms.

683ed6aed885538c4102d8c8.name: AK-50 barrel
683ed6aed885538c4102d8c8.description: A 24 inch barrel for the AK-50 sniper rifle.

683ed6c2e4b1dd7ec4069dc8.name: AK-50 dust cover
683ed6c2e4b1dd7ec4069dc8.description: A receiver dust cover for the AK-50 sniper rifle.

683ed6ccd9a096739b0c9228.name: AK-50 handguard with gas block
683ed6ccd9a096739b0c9228.description: An M-LOK handguard with railed gas block for the AK-50 sniper rifle.

68406efe068a2d99940c1ce3.name: Disk drive 1
68406efe068a2d99940c1ce3.description: A solid state drive. Used to store data with enhanced read and write performance.

68418091b5b0c9e4c60f0e7a.name: Dogtag USEC
68418091b5b0c9e4c60f0e7a.description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. It has an unusual golden tint to it.

684180bc51bf8645f7067bc8.name: Dogtag BEAR
684180bc51bf8645f7067bc8.description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. It has an unusual golden tint to it.

684180ee9b6d80d840042e8a.name: Dogtag USEC
684180ee9b6d80d840042e8a.description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Not every PMC can get one of these.

684181208d035f60230f63f9.name: Dogtag BEAR
684181208d035f60230f63f9.description: A special stainless steel army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Not every PMC can get one of these.

6841b179322db20d190b4b99.name: Get a Life poster
6841b179322db20d190b4b99.description: The girl on the poster is definitely hinting at something. But you're stronger than her urging.

6841b1ff51bf8645f7067bca.name: Get a Paw poster
6841b1ff51bf8645f7067bca.description: We all need a loyal friend. Even if just in the arms of a 2d girl.

6841b3463fcc417de40a6768.name: Armband (Prestige 4)
6841b3463fcc417de40a6768.description: You need to work really hard to earn this armband.

6841b3ab322db20d190b4b9b.name: Armband (Prestige 5)
6841b3ab322db20d190b4b9b.description: An armband available only to a handful of people in Tarkov.

6841b6b674a3c16f5e03d653.name: PMC Origins figurine
6841b6b674a3c16f5e03d653.description: This Tarko figurine depicts a very green PMC just setting foot in the city. There must be two more like this one out there somewhere.

68540a07961c6f351f04d917.name: MP-155 12ga 660mm barrel
68540a07961c6f351f04d917.description: A standard serially produced 660mm barrel with built-in iron sights for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.

68540a100103119fd00e115a.name: MP-155 12ga 750mm barrel
68540a100103119fd00e115a.description: A standard serially produced 750mm barrel with a vent rib for MP-155 12 gauge shotguns.

68540aae1e5c6ff6f1051477.name: AK 7.62x39 Arsenal 4 Piece Flash Hider
68540aae1e5c6ff6f1051477.description: A well-known muzzle device commonly called "The Bulgarian" in Russia. Its reverse-cone shape makes it highly effective at reducing muzzle flash, and it also slightly lessens the concussive effect when firing indoors. Compatible with any caliber from 5.45 to 7.62 on the AK-74 platform, or with the appropriate adapter on AKM or AK-12 assault rifles.

68666482abad2f29b00aab57.name: Programmer's phone
68666482abad2f29b00aab57.description: A broken generic phone, nothing out of the ordinary. However it might help to find Mechanic's acquaintance.

686665484c6f39163e076c3d.name: Map piece
686665484c6f39163e076c3d.description: A piece of a map found on a Scav. Will it lead to trouble or great riches? Time will tell.

6866663e022740fabd074ef2.name: Programmer's diary
6866663e022740fabd074ef2.description:
An unremarkable diary, there are hundreds of those in Tarkov. But don't judge a book by its cover: this particular one contains many dangerous secrets.

The first page has a table of contents:
• Update
• Notes 
• Highlights
• Encrypt
• Agenda 
• Ruminates
• Drafts

6866665cdf54e1190902df55.name: Programmer's diary (Copy)
6866665cdf54e1190902df55.description:
A perfect duplicate of the programmer's diary. How Mechanic achieved such resemblance and why is a mystery.

The first page has a table of contents:
• Update
• Notes 
• Highlights
• Encrypt
• Agenda 
• Ruminates
• Drafts

686666db646d47fec3018925.name: Disk with unknown data
686666db646d47fec3018925.description: The most ordinary-looking disk. The only thing that catches your eye is the “Ⅰ” written on top. If this is a first disk, then there must be a second one somewhere?

68666887df54e1190902df57.name: Decrypted intelligence folder
68666887df54e1190902df57.description: A folder with decrypted data from the military flash drives. Someone out there would give millions for one of these.

6866ad3853330f9b83064cf9.name: Black Division keycard
6866ad3853330f9b83064cf9.description: It seems the Black Division operatives have somehow prepared a working access keycard. It should also work on doors at the seaport.

6866adbe09b973bf45094339.name: Pier gate key
6866adbe09b973bf45094339.description: This key should fit the gate that blocks access to the pier leading to the evacuation zone.

6871284e9a353bb50606f3ed.name: AS VAL MOD.4 9x39 special assault rifle
6871284e9a353bb50606f3ed.description: AS VAL MOD.4 is the fourth special modification of the integrally suppressed assault rifle, intended for Russian special operations units and task groups. The MOD.4 features improved controls: an enlarged magazine release button, additional safety selector lever, and an integrated custom charging handle. Developed by members of the BEAR Norvinsk brigade.

687128c4505fed5f370b1625.name: AS VAL NB MOD.4 Kit handguard
687128c4505fed5f370b1625.description: A custom handguard designed for the AS VAL MOD.4. Features rails for mounting optics, tactical accessories, and foregrips.

68712a7d505fed5f370b1633.name: AS VAL MOD.4 magwell
68712a7d505fed5f370b1633.description: A flared magazine well for the AS VAL MOD.4. Enables faster and more precise magazine insertion.

68712b57a1be89347f0d8179.name: NB MOD.4 Kit 3.5 inch rail
68712b57a1be89347f0d8179.description: A 3.5 inch rail for the AS VAL MOD.4 handguard. Allows installation of tactical equipment.

68712bd4251b8d4c6c04ec19.name: AS VAL NB MOD.4 Kit top cover
68712bd4251b8d4c6c04ec19.description: A custom mount for the AS VAL MOD.4. Allows installation of optics.

68712cafa1be89347f0d817c.name: AS VAL MOD.4 9x39 suppressor cap
68712cafa1be89347f0d817c.description: A muzzle cap for the AS VAL MOD.4 sound suppressor.

68712ce2251b8d4c6c04ec1f.name: AS VAL MOD.4 9x39 integral barrel-suppressor
68712ce2251b8d4c6c04ec1f.description: An integral barrel-suppressor module for the AS VAL MOD.4.

687502c4660d147e2502a94f.name: Disk with release version
687502c4660d147e2502a94f.description: A simple disk with a handwritten note that this is the second version, the final one. Finally you can go through the whole game all the way to the end. Gotta write a review later!

68750378555049ec270cdab7.name: Disk with release version
68750378555049ec270cdab7.description: A simple disk with a handwritten note that this is the second version, the final one. Finally you can go through the whole game all the way to the end. Gotta write a review later!

6877c2dcda2a05d0cb04f983.name: Note mentioning Item #1156
6877c2dcda2a05d0cb04f983.description: A handwritten note left in the open workspace of the TerraGroup laboratory.

6877c834b52f568d4b0ea5a5.name: Note on preparations for the Arrival
6877c834b52f568d4b0ea5a5.description: A torn notebook page detailing preparations for the Arrival.

6877c84d020406d3ea060551.name: ARRS station mechanic's notes
6877c84d020406d3ea060551.description: A note from the mechanic at the ARRS station detailing how to roll back the 14-4 KORD station settings to a backup state.

6877c866ae5d3a06a30d7f3f.name: Order from TerraGroup Worldwide headquarters
6877c866ae5d3a06a30d7f3f.description: A paint-smeared document containing an order from TerraGroup's main office.

6877c87dd66d08f590036126.name: Note with ramblings about the Purification
6877c87dd66d08f590036126.description: A blank TerraGroup sheet with a rough scribble. Doesn't resemble the handwriting of office staff.

6878c143254146e6fd043756.name: AS VAL 9x39 NB MOD.4 muzzle brake
6878c143254146e6fd043756.description: A custom muzzle brake for the AS VAL MOD.4.

6878c1c723c3173d7f06d926.name: AS VAL 9x39 NB MOD.4 JailBrake muzzle device
6878c1c723c3173d7f06d926.description: A custom muzzle device for the AS VAL MOD.4, installed on the MOD.4 handguard.

6878cc5bd0c26d57bf0aa37a.name: AS VAL Zenit RK-3 pistol grip
6878cc5bd0c26d57bf0aa37a.description: A custom Zenit pistol grip for the AS VAL. Replaces the standard pistol grip.

6878ccf4181ac8a5b5077236.name: AS VAL NB stock adapter tube
6878ccf4181ac8a5b5077236.description: An adapter for installing aftermarket buttstocks on the AS VAL.

68889263ea36baf84d085540.name: A.P. meeting audio tape Part 2
68889263ea36baf84d085540.description: A tape from the lecture hall recording one of the TerraGroup meetings.

688893c5a030f9346505e6d5.name: Cult victim audio tape #2
688893c5a030f9346505e6d5.description: An audio tape found among the personal belongings of the victim in the cultists' torture chamber. It seems the owner was chosen deliberately.

68889451ad1e91bfa40db8fd.name: Rus Post audio tape 11.05 / 001
68889451ad1e91bfa40db8fd.description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the first call from May 11.

688894da0bc983c31509f32a.name: Rus Post audio tape 11.05 / 002
688894da0bc983c31509f32a.description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the second call from May 11.

68889504f6192726ac07c66c.name: Rus Post audio tape 11.05 / 003
68889504f6192726ac07c66c.description: One of the audio tapes used by Rus Post to record work calls from its couriers. This tape contains the third call from May 11.

688895322f6b5b76380e6af5.name: Mysterious audio tape
688895322f6b5b76380e6af5.description: An audio tape that somehow ended up in the safe at station 14-4 KORD. Either someone slipped it in unnoticed when the server room’s cooling system was activated, or they already knew what would happen.

6888954ba66a069e0405a9aa.name: SVT-40 Addley Precision Smith-less Scope Mount
6888954ba66a069e0405a9aa.description: A scope mount designed for the SVT-40. Manufactured by Addley Precision.

6888958794cca0a80b070ae9.name: Audio tape with report
6888958794cca0a80b070ae9.description: An audio tape recording the conversations between the Gnezdo outpost fighters and the Bogatyr squad.

6888965ac122cae7a20765fa.name: Voevoda's thoughts audio tape
6888965ac122cae7a20765fa.description: This recording seems to capture one of Voevoda’s reflections on the causes of the Tarkov conflict.

688896b3ea36baf84d085544.name: Moreman's audio tape #1
688896b3ea36baf84d085544.description: This audio tape contains a recording recovered from Moreman’s damaged phone.

68889737562720383f0f8548.name: Moreman's audio tape #2
68889737562720383f0f8548.description: One of the recordings from Moreman’s damaged phone was successfully transferred onto this audio tape.

688897992f6b5b76380e6af9.name: Deceased scientist's audio tape
688897992f6b5b76380e6af9.description: The final recording of a TerraGroup scientist who locked himself in the Labyrinth observation room.

688897e094cca0a80b070aed.name: Audio tape with incriminating evidence
688897e094cca0a80b070aed.description: An audio tape prepared by Kozlov for Anastasia. According to Kozlov’s letters, it contains irrefutable proof of the city administration’s ties to the local criminal underworld.

68889a2f94cca0a80b070af1.name: BEAR commander's audio tape labeled "For the BEARs"
68889a2f94cca0a80b070af1.description: An audio tape containing important instructions left by our squad’s commander.

68889aab3fcaf13e48003ba7.name: USEC commander's audio tape labeled "For the USEC"
68889aab3fcaf13e48003ba7.description: An audio tape containing important instructions left by our squad’s commander.

68889aca77aeb067290816f1.name: USEC operative's audio tape labeled "Day 35"
68889aca77aeb067290816f1.description: A personal audio tape on which a USEC operative recorded a conversation with their commander during a rest stop.

68889c930b29b8032504f369.name: SVT-40 Addley Precision Steel Scope Mount
68889c930b29b8032504f369.description: A scope mount designed for the SVT-40. Manufactured by Addley Precision.

6888ac0f5978b35e90010b49.name: SVT-40 SVD style stock
6888ac0f5978b35e90010b49.description: A wood stock for the SVT-40/AVT-40 rifles styled after the SVD sniper rifle.

6889e4cd3ff7e9cfbc0c507c.name: Military thumb drive
6889e4cd3ff7e9cfbc0c507c.description: An unassuming thumb drive. Contains classified military data which was not taken out of the city in time. It's best to gather as many of these as you can. Just in case.

6889f1c4f7a5d7de7b089550.name: FN Five-seveN 5.7x28 Pro-Mag 30-round magazine
6889f1c4f7a5d7de7b089550.description: A 30-round 5.7x28 magazine for the FN Five-seveN pistol. Manufactured by ProMag.

688a0b38467521f9080693a3.name: MeproLight Mepro M21 reflex sight
688a0b38467521f9080693a3.description: A fiber optic red dot sight manufactured by MeproLight. Installed on a proprietary mount.

688a0bf28cdd409ce60911ce.name: MeproLight Mepro red dot mount
688a0bf28cdd409ce60911ce.description: A Picatinny/Weaver quick-detach mount base for Mepro series red dot sights. Manufactured by MeproLight.

688b2dba67bf6fa26c07e918.name: Toolbox (Discord Version)
688b2dba67bf6fa26c07e918.description: An ordinary toolbox with an unordinary color. Most of the stickers on it are inexistent in Tarkov. Someone has paid a hefty price to smuggle it from outside the cordon.

688b2e574172ca83e70cf868.name: Armband (Purple)
688b2e574172ca83e70cf868.description: A unique armband for the most sociable operators.

688b3bfa1ed594eccd0c45ee.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Ping)
688b3bfa1ed594eccd0c45ee.description: A unique face mask with an unusual paint job. Guess someone should check their DMs.

688b44cb28bf8d85cd0ff108.name: Trijicon SRO reflex sight
688b44cb28bf8d85cd0ff108.description: The SRO (Specialized Reflex Optic) is a rugged, compact reflex sight. It can be used as a primary or backup optic. Requires a compatible base to mount on Weaver-style rails. Manufactured by Trijicon.

688b4bd81cef2a61d0052738.name: Trijicon SRO reflex sight (FDE)
688b4bd81cef2a61d0052738.description: The SRO (Specialized Reflex Optic) is a rugged, compact reflex sight. It can be used as a primary or backup optic. Requires a compatible base to mount on Weaver-style rails. Manufactured by Trijicon. Flat Dark Earth version.

688b54a11cef2a61d005273b.name: Elcan SpecterDR Mounting Plate for Trijicon
688b54a11cef2a61d005273b.description: A mount base for installation of RMR-type reflex sights on the Elcan SpecterDR scope.

688b79b5eb234c75d900e050.name: 9A-91 TTS System handguard
688b79b5eb234c75d900e050.description: A 9A-91 handguard with a bottom rail for installation of foregrips. Manufactured by TTS System.

688b7b0d934c59b7bf0af0b7.name: TTS System handguard top rail
688b7b0d934c59b7bf0af0b7.description: A compact lightweight rail for the TTS System handguard, designed for installation of small optics or tactical devices. Manufactured by TTS System.

688b7c1b0e99e554a90c0fb7.name: TTS System 2.5 inch rail
688b7c1b0e99e554a90c0fb7.description: A 2.5 inch rail that allows installation of additional equipment on the TTS System handguard. Manufactured by TTS System.

688c86420e99e554a90c0fd6.name: SR-3M Karden rail handguard
688c86420e99e554a90c0fd6.description: A custom handguard for the SR-3M assault rifle made on order from one of the well-known local operatives. Made out of aircraft-grade aluminum alloy and fitted with Zenit rails for installation of additional tactical equipment.

688c9df121038434840a1e06.name: AK JMac Customs RSA-5.5 stock adapter
688c9df121038434840a1e06.description: An adapter for installing 1913 Picatinny buttstocks, designed for AK-style assault rifles with 5.5mm pin folding stocks. Manufactured by JMac Customs.

688cbdc341e2a57a8f0c1c6c.name: AK Samson Rear Trunnion Folding Stock Adapter
688cbdc341e2a57a8f0c1c6c.description: A 1913 stock adapter, designed for installation on AK-series assault rifles. Manufactured by Samson Manufacturing.

689166b6c2d6fa42e7044756.name: Kalashnikov AK-308 7.62x51 assault rifle
689166b6c2d6fa42e7044756.description: A variant of the Kalashnikov assault rifle designed for export to countries whose armies continue to use the 7.62x51 NATO (.308 Win) cartridge as their standard infantry small arms ammunition. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

689166debd91cc17c109c753.name: AK-308 handguard
689166debd91cc17c109c753.description: A standard-issue handguard for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

68916701bd91cc17c109c758.name: AK-308 7.62x51 20-round magazine
68916701bd91cc17c109c758.description: A 20-round 7.62x51 NATO magazine for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

689167248f19dbc8190728ed.name: AK-308 railed dust cover
689167248f19dbc8190728ed.description: A standard receiver dust cover with an integrated Picatinny rail for AK-308 assault rifles. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

68916765fa628c6b9f0ed6f6.name: AK-308 rear sight base
68916765fa628c6b9f0ed6f6.description: A standard-issue removable rear sight base mount for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

689167d79f03ec70cb0ea066.name: AK-308 7.62x51 flash hider
689167d79f03ec70cb0ea066.description: A standard-issue 7.62x51 NATO flash hider for the AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by Kalashnikov Group.

6891bb203bbad2a6230f9be8.name: Note from USEC's corpse
6891bb203bbad2a6230f9be8.description: A note in which someone scolds a USEC operative for poor weapon maintenance.

6891bb67f674f551000a38d3.name: Escape route map from the TerraGroup office area
6891bb67f674f551000a38d3.description: A map showing USEC retreat points from the TerraGroup office area. Judging by the tags, it was intercepted by the BEARs after the EMP blast.

6891bb83d7502d512502d160.name: Tarkov News Issue #142
6891bb83d7502d512502d160.description: A newspaper issue featuring an article on the escalating conflict in Tarkov.

6891bb9f81d0bf37b10249f4.name: Blue Fire witness note
6891bb9f81d0bf37b10249f4.description: A mysterious note mentioning the EMP blast that occurred over the TerraGroup office.

68935269af943a06e8038c58.name: Saiga-308/AK-308 7.62x51 ProMag 24-round magazine
68935269af943a06e8038c58.description: A 24-round polymer magazine for the Saiga-308 carbine and AK-308 assault rifle. Manufactured by ProMag.

689479a4a733b1602007e2eb.name: Spiritus Systems LV-119 Plate Carrier (Black Division V1)
689479a4a733b1602007e2eb.description: A highly customizable modular plate carrier by Spiritus Systems, built for maximum comfort in combat. Wolf Grey version. This setup allows full freedom of movement while providing an ergonomic layout for ammunition and essential gear.

689479cb47e5acd1e10be986.name: Ferro Concepts FCPC V5 Plate Carrier (Black Division)
689479cb47e5acd1e10be986.description: The fifth-generation FCPC plate carrier continues Ferro Concepts’ focus on lightweight, adaptable gear. In this version, the plate bags and carrier contour have been redesigned for improved comfort and mobility. Coyote Brown version. Equipped with two radios for communicating with both the assigned squad and HQ.

689479eb30cc5ba7be00f5ff.name: Spiritus Systems LV-119 Plate Carrier (Black Division V2)
689479eb30cc5ba7be00f5ff.description: A highly customizable modular plate carrier by Spiritus Systems, built for maximum comfort in combat. Black version. This setup is equipped with breaching charges and multiple GP pouches for maximum equipment flexibility.

68947a4be4bf255d1b0ca746.name: First Spear Siege-R Optimized M.A.S.S. Plate Carrier (Black Division)
68947a4be4bf255d1b0ca746.description: A Siege-R Optimized plate carrier equipped with the M.A.S.S. Shoulder System. Provides reliable all-around protection while offering ample workspace for equipment placement. Black version.

68947a8ce4bf255d1b0ca759.name: Tasmanian Tiger Modular Pack 45 Plus (MultiCam Black)
68947a8ce4bf255d1b0ca759.description: The TT Modular Pack 45 is a system that can be customized to suit the user’s needs. The top flap can be raised to increase capacity or removed entirely if required. External straps allow attachment of bulky gear or equipment that needs to remain easily accessible. MultiCam Black version.

68947ab5a733b1602007e2fe.name: Mystery Ranch 2 Day Assault Pack (Black)
68947ab5a733b1602007e2fe.description: This Mystery Ranch backpack is designed for short missions of up to two days. Its compact size is offset by excellent ergonomics. External straps provide convenient attachment points for tools and gear you might need on the go.

68947ad3e4bf255d1b0ca75c.name: Mystery Ranch NICE Frame Load Sling
68947ad3e4bf255d1b0ca75c.description: The Load Sling by Mystery Ranch allows to carry heavy, irregularly shaped cargo. Its strap system secures items safely and reliably, while the external MOLLE straps provide versatile attachment points for smaller gear. This particular model is equipped with a spacious case offering extra protection.

68948a95d8f2b85fb705e2a6.name: 6B45 body armor
68948a95d8f2b85fb705e2a6.description: The 6B45 body armor, designed to protect personnel from shrapnel and small arms fire. Part of the Ratnik equipment system and has been in production since the 2010s as a replacement for the 6B43 model.

68948ad72c87773b9f06d73f.name: 6B45 armored rig (General Purpose)
68948ad72c87773b9f06d73f.description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup gives the user a compact yet versatile space for carrying essential gear.

68948aebd8f2b85fb705e2b0.name: 6B45 armored rig (Medic)
68948aebd8f2b85fb705e2b0.description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup allows for convenient placement of essential combat medical supplies and communication equipment.

68948b118c57a8a52301d7ae.name: 6B45 armored rig (Assault)
68948b118c57a8a52301d7ae.description: A full plate carrier setup built on the 6B45 vest. This setup provides maximum space for carrying magazines and grenades.

6895bb82c4519957df062f82.name: Radian Weapons Model 1 FA 5.56x45 assault rifle
6895bb82c4519957df062f82.description: Radian Model 1 Full Auto, an AR-15 platform assault rifle chambered for 5.56x45 NATO. The rifle is positioned as a reliable, high-quality, and accurate system for professional and sporting use. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.

6895bd19d55f0ebf6a0c0306.name: AR-15 Radian Model 1 14 inch handguard
6895bd19d55f0ebf6a0c0306.description: A precision CNC machined 14 inch handguard, equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.

6895becad55f0ebf6a0c0311.name: AR-15 Radian Weapons Model 1 5.56x45 upper receiver
6895becad55f0ebf6a0c0311.description: A precision CNC machined upper receiver for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.

6895bf08e2d16810ba0bf43e.name: AR-15 Radian Weapons Raptor-SD charging handle
6895bf08e2d16810ba0bf43e.description: An ambidextrous charging handle for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Radian Weapons.

689b3fffa1295e322207a677.name: Gatorz Specter MILSPEC ballistic glasses
689b3fffa1295e322207a677.description: The Gatorz Specter glasses provide full eye protection and are designed to be worn with helmets, headsets, or ear protection.

689b404db49f27df1c0873f6.name: Gentex Ops-Core SOTR respirator
689b404db49f27df1c0873f6.description: The SOTR respirator was developed by Gentex to protect operators from hazardous airborne compounds and particles, intended for use only in ground operations. Provides reliable filtration against most harmful particles, including lead, asbestos, lubricants, and smoke from burning materials.

689b4d39987b304021088e8d.name: Plane crew transcript
689b4d39987b304021088e8d.description: A printout of the transcript from the pilots of the downed aircraft.

689b4ed2987b304021088e8f.name: Note from Mr. Kerman
689b4ed2987b304021088e8f.description: A note with a warning from an unknown sender.

689b4f338dbf3fd40f0bc778.name: RFID card manual
689b4f338dbf3fd40f0bc778.description: A TerraGroup instruction manual included with Kruglov's RFID card.

689b4f5f6035689a0c0724ce.name: Transcript of conversation with Ms. A.
689b4f5f6035689a0c0724ce.description: A printout of miss A.'s conversation with an unidentified individual.

689b5072665c386d9c007a41.name: Folder with intelligence on Norvinsk region facilities
689b5072665c386d9c007a41.description: A TerraGroup report compiling information on government facilities in the Norvinsk region.

689b5093987b304021088e91.name: Note from Prapor's men
689b5093987b304021088e91.description: The note mentions the delivery of some goods near the lighthouse.

689b50ec127673bbd40706d1.name: Document on changes in enterprise interactions
689b50ec127673bbd40706d1.description: A TerraGroup document detailing updated procedures for working with contractors. Some of the information has been blacked out.

689b5108304455f61a0bc298.name: Cargo transport fax
689b5108304455f61a0bc298.description: A fax containing instructions for moving a certain shipment. Some of the information has been blacked out with a marker.

689b512b075404ce7e09ec12.name: Hard drive printout
689b512b075404ce7e09ec12.description: A printout of correspondence recovered from the hard drive in A.P.’s car.

689b514c886e9848a4085915.name: Transport log with notes
689b514c886e9848a4085915.description: A transport log with handwritten markings. It's clear the cargo was never meant to go through official channels.

689b5187665c386d9c007a43.name: Fuel catalyst test report
689b5187665c386d9c007a43.description: A TerraGroup report on fuel catalyst tests conducted at Chemical Plant #16.

689b51b2987b304021088e93.name: Guard post note
689b51b2987b304021088e93.description: A handwritten note left at the guard post.

689b5218533aa51a060f810a.name: Document mentioning the Warden
689b5218533aa51a060f810a.description: A paint-smeared document with no stamps or logos.

689b5256147eeab4410ecd14.name: Document mentioning a protocol
689b5256147eeab4410ecd14.description: A paint-smeared document with no stamps or logos.

689b52892c175da5bf083ba1.name: Copy of report for TG Worldwide
689b52892c175da5bf083ba1.description: A copy of the report intended for the TerraGroup headquarters. Smeared in ink.

689b52d6886e9848a4085917.name: Item #1156 specification
689b52d6886e9848a4085917.description: The full specification for Item #1156, intended for transport from Tarkov to Norvinsk.

689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16.name: Note about the Eye of the World
689b52ff147eeab4410ecd16.description: A cultist's note mentioning something called the Eye of the World.

689b53222c175da5bf083ba3.name: Book of the Arrival
689b53222c175da5bf083ba3.description: A homemade book filled with notes and drawings about witnesses of the Arrival, The Unheard, and the end of the old world.

689b536a4b553916720119aa.name: Programmer's note
689b536a4b553916720119aa.description: A note in which the programmer writes about how they became one of the Witnesses of the Arrival.

689b53952b1ac3b0810b7fe0.name: Victim's note
689b53952b1ac3b0810b7fe0.description: A note from an NGO Cobalt specialist who was hiding from the cultists.

689b53b7127673bbd40706d3.name: Newspaper clipping from the cultists' house
689b53b7127673bbd40706d3.description: A newspaper clipping featuring an article about the NGO Cobalt. It seems the cultists took a great interest in this organization.

689b53ef987b304021088e95.name: ARRS system specifications
689b53ef987b304021088e95.description: A full specification for the ARRS system. Most of it is encrypted.

689b5f0f986634d56b0e099f.name: Targrad Tales poster
689b5f0f986634d56b0e099f.description: A poster that someone left right outside the door of your Hideout. A limited edition item. It'll remind you of all the time you spent in front of your monitor.

689b880fff8b4adc420f5b56.name: Avon M53A1 gas mask
689b880fff8b4adc420f5b56.description: The gas mask from Avon Protection was developed under the JSGPM (Joint Service General Purpose Mask) program to provide special operations forces with maximum protection against CBRN threats while keeping the design lightweight and comfortable for use in a wide range of conditions.

689b8883b49f27df1c0873f8.name: Wilcox L4G24 NVG Mount (Coyote)
689b8883b49f27df1c0873f8.description: A universal adjustable night vision mounting system manufactured by Wilcox. Features a breakaway lever that disconnects under stress to prevent user injury. Compatible with most night vision shrouds and adapters. Coyote version.

689b889473ebd6871805edd6.name: L3Harris PVS-31A night vision goggles
689b889473ebd6871805edd6.description: A very lightweight and ergonomic night vision device manufactured by L3Harris. Provides an optimal field of view and a clear image not only in low-light conditions but also in the presence of bright light sources. Equipped with Butler Creek flip-open lens protectors. White Phosphor tubes version.

689c887cd18a3665b8045743.name: SureFire M600 Ultra Scout Light
689c887cd18a3665b8045743.description: A modern lightweight tactical weapon light, installed on special compatible mounts. Manufactured by SureFire.

689c8981bce76ccfbf01862f.name: SureFire M600 Scout Light Thumbscrew Mount
689c8981bce76ccfbf01862f.description: A Picatinny/Weaver mount for M600/M300 series weapon lights. Manufactured by SureFire.

689c8a2b4b91399db3085f27.name: Arisaka Inline Scout Mount KeyMod
689c8a2b4b91399db3085f27.description: A weapon light mount designed for KeyMod interface. Manufactured by Arisaka.

689c8b454b91399db3085f2a.name: Arisaka Inline Scout Mount M-LOK
689c8b454b91399db3085f2a.description: A weapon light mount designed for M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Arisaka.

689dbded6c7e684817080c29.name: Wilcox L4G24 NVG Mount (Black)
