689dbded6c7e684817080c29.description: A universal adjustable night vision mounting system manufactured by Wilcox. Features a breakaway lever that disconnects under stress to prevent user injury. Compatible with most night vision shrouds and adapters. Black version.

68a5ab09c44fa287ba0a97b5.name: FALKE LE reflex sight
68a5ab09c44fa287ba0a97b5.description: A rugged reflex sight made for withstanding harsh environmental conditions, compatible with NVGs and various weapon builds. Manufactured by FALKE.

68a5ac69b55a6b93c20a2bc7.name: SwampFox Justice reflex sight
68a5ac69b55a6b93c20a2bc7.description: A rugged everyday carry reflex sight, made for use on pistols, carbines, or shotguns. Can be used as a main or backup sight, requires a corresponding Weaver mount. Manufactured by SwampFox.

68a5dc0c2cd64a8b58023b87.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK base (Black)
68a5dc0c2cd64a8b58023b87.description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Black version.

68a5dc4eed35a7eac1048ff6.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 8.5 inch handguard
68a5dc4eed35a7eac1048ff6.description: An 8.5 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.

68a639748e1fe612970728e9.name: Colt M16A1 5.56x45 assault rifle
68a639748e1fe612970728e9.description: An American-made 5.56x45mm assault rifle developed by Colt in the late 1960s as an improved variant of the original AR-15/M16 design. The M16A1 became the standard service rifle of the US military during the Vietnam War, featuring a forward assist and other refinements for reliability in harsh conditions. Though considered outdated by modern standards, it remains a durable and accurate weapon prized by collectors and shooters alike.

68a6399922b1e0bd360afe56.name: Colt M16A2 5.56x45 assault rifle
68a6399922b1e0bd360afe56.description: A later evolution of the M16 platform, the M16A2 introduced a burst-fire mechanism, improved iron sights, handguard and buttstock for greater control and durability. Chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition, it served as the primary service rifle for the U.S. military throughout the 1980s and 1990s. Known for its precision and dependability, the M16A2 remains a benchmark for modern assault rifle design.

68a63a9522b1e0bd360afe5f.name: AR-15 Colt early type charging handle
68a63a9522b1e0bd360afe5f.description: An early type charging handle for AR-15 and compatible systems, manufactured by Colt.

68a63ac58e1fe612970728f2.name: AR-15 5.56x45 A2 type 20 inch barrel
68a63ac58e1fe612970728f2.description: A 20 inch (508mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Corresponds with standard service M16A2 barrel.

68a63b03e1fb670852024656.name: AR-15 Colt USGI A1 3-prong 5.56x45 flash hider
68a63b03e1fb670852024656.description: A three-prong flash hider for the AR-15 series rifles, manufactured by Colt. The classic earlier A1 variant made in the 60s, which was later replaced by the more famous Bird Cage type.

68a63b73c92ee33ffa01bf57.name: AR-15 5.56x45 Colt STANAG 20-round magazine
68a63b73c92ee33ffa01bf57.description: A classic 20-round 5.56x45 magazine for AR-15. Manufactured by Colt.

68a63b90e1fb670852024659.name: M16A1E1 5.56x45 upper receiver
68a63b90e1fb670852024659.description: An upper receiver for the M16A1E1 assault rifle manufactured by Colt. An early prototype variant between the M16A1 and M16A2, which also served as the basis for the Canadian C7. During the 1980s it was widely fitted to various special carbines produced by Colt.

68a63b9b8e1fe612970728f7.name: M16A2 5.56x45 upper receiver
68a63b9b8e1fe612970728f7.description: An upper receiver for the M16A2 assault rifle manufactured by Colt.

68a63bc422b1e0bd360afe61.name: AR-15 Colt M16A1 Type 7 stock
68a63bc422b1e0bd360afe61.description: A standard-issue buttstock for the early-issue M16A1 assault rifles, compatible with AR-15 and AR-10 platforms.

68a63c1fc92ee33ffa01bf5a.name: AR-15 Colt A2 stock
68a63c1fc92ee33ffa01bf5a.description: The A2 type buttstock for the AR-15. Standard-issue for M16A2 assault rifles. Manufactured by Colt.

68a63c5ce1fb670852024661.name: AR-15 Colt A2 buffer tube
68a63c5ce1fb670852024661.description: Colt Receiver Extension Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec diameter will fit any AR-15-based carbine or rifle.

68a63c7322b1e0bd360afe65.name: AR-15 Colt N1 Stock
68a63c7322b1e0bd360afe65.description: A telescopic buttstock, second generation of the classic stock for CAR-15. Manufactured by Colt.

68a63c998e1fe612970728fe.name: AR-15 John Masen Recoil Pad
68a63c998e1fe612970728fe.description: A rubber buttpad for the Colt N1 series stocks, improves ergonomics and cushions felt recoil. Manufactured by John Masen Co.

68a63cb3e1fb670852024664.name: AR-15 Colt M16A1 handguard
68a63cb3e1fb670852024664.description: A triangular fiberglass rifle handguard manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A1 rifles.

68a63cc0c92ee33ffa01bf5c.name: AR-15 Colt M16A2 handguard
68a63cc0c92ee33ffa01bf5c.description: A polymer rifle handguard manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A2 rifles.

68a63ccc8a85019a82087956.name: AR-15 CAR-15 Skinny handguard
68a63ccc8a85019a82087956.description: An old-style carbine length "skinny" handguard manufactured by Colt.

68a63cdac92ee33ffa01bf5f.name: AR-15 KAC M5 RAS handguard
68a63cdac92ee33ffa01bf5f.description: A quad-rail handguard manufactured by Knight's Armament Company. Standard-issue handguard for the M16A4 rifle.

68a63ce2e1fb670852024667.name: AR-15 KAC M5 RAS lower handguard
68a63ce2e1fb670852024667.description: A bottom rail part of the M5 RAS handguard. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.

68a63d1522b1e0bd360afe67.name: AR-15 ProMag Delta Style scope mount
68a63d1522b1e0bd360afe67.description: A scope mount that fits over the AR-15 carry handle. Modeled after the mount from the 1990s. Manufactured by ProMag.

68a63d3c8e977b40b2032286.name: MaTech BUIS rear sight
68a63d3c8e977b40b2032286.description: A back-up iron sight manufactured by MaTech Solutions.

68a63d4f22b1e0bd360afe6a.name: AR-15 Colt A1 pistol grip
68a63d4f22b1e0bd360afe6a.description: An older style polymer pistol grip manufactured by Colt.

68a6413b54ef229c4d089238.name: AR-15 Colt A2 lower handguard
68a6413b54ef229c4d089238.description: A bottom part of the A2 handguard, manufactured by Colt. Standard-issue handguard for M16A2 rifles.

68a641452258a88280055616.name: AR-15 Colt CAR-15 Skinny lower handguard
68a641452258a88280055616.description: A bottom part of the CAR-15 handguard, manufactured by Colt.

68a6d95addf0111c2f04c9c3.name: SHIELD Absolute Cinema hard hat (Orange)
68a6d95addf0111c2f04c9c3.description: A basic orange construction hard hat designed to make you stand out. But is that really what you want out here?

68a6d96fddf0111c2f04c9c9.name: SHIELD Absolute Cinema hard hat (White)
68a6d96fddf0111c2f04c9c9.description: A white construction hard hat built to stop falling bricks. Will it stop a bullet? Test at your own risk.

68a6e8fd4ac5b037cb0e9b86.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK Extension (Black)
68a6e8fd4ac5b037cb0e9b86.description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Black version.

68a6f3b27279296357007cd7.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 11 inch handguard
68a6f3b27279296357007cd7.description: An 11 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.

68a6fbb07279296357007ce2.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 15 inch handguard
68a6fbb07279296357007ce2.description: A 15 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.

68a6fbfdd31595bb360c73bd.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK 17 inch handguard
68a6fbfdd31595bb360c73bd.description: A 17 inch main body of the GRIDLOK handguard for the AR-15 platform. Equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional equipment. Manufactured by Strike Industries.

68a6ff732885e0bbd30bb6f9.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK Extension (Yellow)
68a6ff732885e0bbd30bb6f9.description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Yellow version.

68a6ff952885e0bbd30bb6fd.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK Extension (Red)
68a6ff952885e0bbd30bb6fd.description: An extension for the GRIDLOK handguard. Equipped with a folding front sight, Picatinny rail, and an M-LOK interface. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Red version.

68a6fff085a17dc1cb008066.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK base (Yellow)
68a6fff085a17dc1cb008066.description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Yellow version.

68a7000d7708ac5120060527.name: AR-15 Strike Industries GRIDLOK base (Red)
68a7000d7708ac5120060527.description: A base for installing GRIDLOK AR-15 handguards. Manufactured by Strike Industries. Red version.

68a85ab8ef22d08bf401fa68.name: First Spear Strandhogg plate carrier (ABUPAT)
68a85ab8ef22d08bf401fa68.description: Taking its name from an Old Norse Viking term for a lightning raid, Strandhögg was one of the first formalized battle tactics to use covert infiltrators in advance of an actual raiding operation. Strandhögg was a tactical game-changer in its time, just like the technological advances First Spear is bringing forward in this line of plate carriers. US Air Force ABU pattern camouflage version.

68a85ac615a5769d50029cd9.name: ANA Tactical Alpha chest rig (A-TACS AU)
68a85ac615a5769d50029cd9.description: "Alpha" is a high-quality chest rig that fully meets the military standards for reliability and functionality. The combination of integrated pouches and MOLLE straps provides the means of carrying a large number of necessary equipment. The vest is designed as a classic chest rig. In this type of vest, all the gear is located in the front and side parts, while the back part is comprised of adjustment belts and straps. Manufactured by ANA Tactical. A-TACS AU camouflage version.

68a86bd51d1284a8e20e39d5.name: AR-15 5.56x45 11.5 inch barrel
68a86bd51d1284a8e20e39d5.description: An 11.5 inch (292mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo.

68a89146212dbbeead0d5636.name: NFM THOR Concealable Reinforced Vest body armor (Head Eyes)
68a89146212dbbeead0d5636.description: A low-profile body armor manufactured by NFM. A version for those who really feel the Tarkov atmosphere.

68a89942431252e29a02dbf6.name: Interceptor OTV body armor (Woodland)
68a89942431252e29a02dbf6.description: The Interceptor vest consists of a fabric Outer Tactical Vest (OTV) with dorsal and thoracic pockets and two protective ceramic-composite SAPI or ESAPI inserts. The Outer Tactical Vest (OTV) is a basic vest equipped with aramid fabric pouches that protect against ammunition fragments and 9mm handgun bullets. Woodland camouflage version.

68a97093431252e29a02dc06.name: NPP KlASS Korund-VM body armor (Kamysh)
68a97093431252e29a02dc06.description: The NPP KlASS Korund-VM heavy bulletproof vest, adopted by the units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia. Kamysh camouflage version.

68a986615db8a4a66404ff9a.name: WARTECH MK3 TV-104 chest rig (Moss)
68a986615db8a4a66404ff9a.description: This chest rig platform is designed for placing equipment in the chest and abdomen areas, with an open back. Includes integrated pouches, designed for 8 magazines. Can be used both separately and on top of the armor vest. Manufactured by WARTECH. Moss camouflage version.

68a986ca5c0073fa2d0d8cb8.name: Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 bulletproof helmet (Eight-ball)
68a986ca5c0073fa2d0d8cb8.description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Too big for pool.

68a98762609a5cb2120ebd26.name: Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 bulletproof helmet (Flame)
68a98762609a5cb2120ebd26.description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Would match well with a motorbike and leather jacket.

68a987a1609a5cb2120ebd2f.name: Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 bulletproof helmet (Camouflage)
68a987a1609a5cb2120ebd2f.description: The Vulkan-5 LShZ-5 high-level protection helmet is intended for use in a set of combat equipment with circular 5-class (Russian GOST) head protection from medium to heavy projectiles. Your head is basically invisible with this camouflage.

68a99207aa809946e507c2f6.name: Stich Profi Plate Carrier V2 (MARPAT Woodland)
68a99207aa809946e507c2f6.description: An improved lightweight version of the standard plate carrier manufactured by Stich Profi. MARPAT Woodland camouflage version.

68a9a04373d52d47830759c7.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Loui Peeton)
68a9a04373d52d47830759c7.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. Draws eyes and makes the poor cry.

68a9a0b01696fb8c1e0ee9cc.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Toxic)
68a9a0b01696fb8c1e0ee9cc.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. A bright warning that the user is dangerous for the environment.

68a9a1223e1ee5a70504c126.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Crash Tested)
68a9a1223e1ee5a70504c126.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. This mask has passed the test.

68a9a15d73d52d47830759c9.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Demonic Face)
68a9a15d73d52d47830759c9.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against wide variety of short-mid range weapons including shotguns and assault rifles. Has all the qualities of a top arena fighter – stylish, luxurious, and intimidating all at once.

68a9a85c3e1ee5a70504c12e.name: DevTac Ronin Respirator (Beast)
68a9a85c3e1ee5a70504c12e.description: A Japan-styled tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full NIJ level IIIA protection of the whole head, though you really don't want to get shot in the face with this thing. Comes with an intimidating print.

68a9a92b838d65bcb3050176.name: DevTac Ronin Respirator (Eternal Green)
68a9a92b838d65bcb3050176.description: A Japan-styled tactical helmet, manufactured by DevTac. Not used by any military or special forces. Just somehow happened to be in Tarkov for some frivolous price. Features a full NIJ level IIIA protection of the whole head, though you really don't want to get shot in the face with this thing. Painted in green with red and black accents.

68a9acd9389d6cb1f90af562.name: Balaclava (Unicorn)
68a9acd9389d6cb1f90af562.description: A balaclava for those who really want to stand out.

68a9adc2bc09b91c4f07dbe6.name: Balaclava (Zaebtsa)
68a9adc2bc09b91c4f07dbe6.description: A balaclava for very positive warriors.

68a9b3ca0a9c4f9398032c46.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid helmet (MultiCam)
68a9b3ca0a9c4f9398032c46.description: The Caiman Hybrid helmet is a new generation of lightweight special forces helmet. This bump version, through some Tarkov magic, features a protection level similar to normal ballistic helmets. Manufactured by Galvion. MultiCam camouflage version.

68a9b5a5863d2a71fa0494a6.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid helmet (Mutualist)
68a9b5a5863d2a71fa0494a6.description: The Caiman Hybrid helmet is a new generation of lightweight special forces helmet. This bump version, through some Tarkov magic, features a protection level similar to normal ballistic helmets. Manufactured by Galvion. Painted with an intimidating print.

68a9b601863d2a71fa0494ae.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Applique (MultiCam)
68a9b601863d2a71fa0494ae.description: An additional up-armor helmet shell attachment to elevate or enhance ballistic and fragmentation protection of the Caiman Hybrid Helmet. Manufactured by Galvion. MultiCam camouflage version.

68a9b669fa39b6976e07de96.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Applique (Mutualist)
68a9b669fa39b6976e07de96.description: An additional up-armor helmet shell attachment to elevate or enhance ballistic and fragmentation protection of the Caiman Hybrid Helmet. Manufactured by Galvion. Painted with an intimidating print.

68a9b6c8d3a061d8b6058346.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Mandible Guard (MultiCam)
68a9b6c8d3a061d8b6058346.description: A special additional ballistic protection for the Caiman Hybrid helmet, mounted on the side rails. Manufactured by Galvion. MultiCam camouflage version.

68a9b73bd3a061d8b6058348.name: Galvion Caiman Hybrid Ballistic Mandible Guard (Mutualist)
68a9b73bd3a061d8b6058348.description: A special additional ballistic protection for the Caiman Hybrid helmet, mounted on the side rails. Manufactured by Galvion. Painted with an intimidating print.

68a9b821cdf661cc5a0626c6.name: Death Shadow lightweight armored mask (Gold)
68a9b821cdf661cc5a0626c6.description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. Gold version.

68a9b852cdf661cc5a0626c9.name: Death Shadow lightweight armored mask (Gray)
68a9b852cdf661cc5a0626c9.description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. Gray version with orange lenses.

68a9b873a4b28d56c80a1818.name: Death Shadow lightweight armored mask (White)
68a9b873a4b28d56c80a1818.description: The "Death Shadow" mask for face protection, reinforced with aramid fibers. Only airsofters would find this mask cool. White version.

68a9be93f260f4e1c2038686.name: Diamond Age NeoSteel High Cut helmet (Orange Stains)
68a9be93f260f4e1c2038686.description: The Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet features a unique design that combines high-strength steel with composite materials to provide advanced protection against ballistic and impact threats. Painted with orange stripes to add some character.

68a9beecbba00932ed0bc256.name: Diamond Age NeoSteel High Cut helmet (Aces)
68a9beecbba00932ed0bc256.description: The Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet features a unique design that combines high-strength steel with composite materials to provide advanced protection against ballistic and impact threats. Comes with a lucky paint job.

68a9bf7d9f4c45817b0d83b6.name: Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet ballistic mandible (Black)
68a9bf7d9f4c45817b0d83b6.description: An extra ballistic protection for the Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet. Black version.

68a9c0ed6d47c49b700faaf9.name: Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet ballistic mandible (Aces)
68a9c0ed6d47c49b700faaf9.description: An extra ballistic protection for the Diamond Age NeoSteel helmet. Comes with a lucky paint job.

68aee763130c00663d08aea8.name: TKPD 9.3x64 carbine
68aee763130c00663d08aea8.description: The TKPD (Tyazhelyy Karabin Podderzhki Dragunova - "Dragunov Heavy Support Carbine") is a modernized SVDK chambered in 9.3x64mm, commissioned by PMC BEAR. The weapon is noted for high accuracy and effectively suppresses targets at medium ranges. Manufactured by SniperArms Dynamics.

68aee8f8130c00663d08aeb3.name: TKPD railed dust cover
68aee8f8130c00663d08aeb3.description: A receiver top cover for the TKPD assault carbine. Equipped with a Picatinny rail for installation of optics.

68aee9731ef0d507780a61c9.name: TKPD front trunnion
68aee9731ef0d507780a61c9.description: A handguard mounting trunnion for the TKPD assault carbine.

68aee9b89df2c1144f0aaa46.name: TKPD 9.3x64 457mm barrel
68aee9b89df2c1144f0aaa46.description: A 457mm barrel for the TKPD 9.3x64mm assault carbine.

68aee9e31ef0d507780a61cd.name: TKPD gas tube
68aee9e31ef0d507780a61cd.description: A standard gas tube for the TKPD assault carbine.

68aee9fe130c00663d08aeb6.name: TKPD handguard (Black)
68aee9fe130c00663d08aeb6.description: A standard handguard for the TKPD assault carbine. Allows installation of tactical equipment and a bipod. Black version.

68aeeb3e9df2c1144f0aaa4b.name: TKPD 9.3x64 muzzle brake
68aeeb3e9df2c1144f0aaa4b.description: A muzzle brake for the TKPD assault carbine.

68aeed8a8906b00bc800fdd6.name: 9.3x64mm SP
68aeed8a8906b00bc800fdd6.description: A 9.3x64mm Soft Point hunting cartridge loaded with a 17.4 gram semi-jacketed bullet. The bullet delivers increased stopping power at medium ranges and is intended for hunting large game, as it provides strong terminal performance and can cause severe incapacitating wounds on impact.

68aef9bf4efeccb5220d25c6.name: TKPD 9.3x64 10-round magazine
68aef9bf4efeccb5220d25c6.description: A 10-round 9.3x64mm magazine for the TKPD assault carbine.

68b966e44b7f808d5609ac04.name: VPO-215 tactical chassis
68b966e44b7f808d5609ac04.description: A tactical chassis for the VPO-215 Gornostay hunting rifle.

68b97e7fd9dbc47f4808b09d.name: VPO-215 tactical chassis front rail
68b97e7fd9dbc47f4808b09d.description: A front rail for the VPO-125 tactical chassis. Allows installation of tactical equipment.

68b98415032fa71d2a000dab.name: VPO-215 .366TKM 360mm barrel
68b98415032fa71d2a000dab.description: A 360mm barrel for VPO-215 rifle chambered in .366TKM.

68b985da5133d696f7032d37.name: VPO-215 tactical thread protector
68b985da5133d696f7032d37.description: A tactical threading protection cap for the VPO-215 .366TKM rifle barrel.

68bac6ca653ee6b1e406d978.name: 9.3x64mm FMJ
68bac6ca653ee6b1e406d978.description: A civilian 9.3x64mm Full Metal Jacket cartridge loaded with a 17.5 gram fully jacketed bullet. The full metal jacket reduces deformation on impact. This cartridge is most commonly used for sport shooting, training, and zeroing, and is sometimes used for hunting when minimal damage to game is desired.

68bad8376cb22acf1107a586.name: 9.3x64mm 7N33
68bad8376cb22acf1107a586.description: A military 9.3x64mm 7N33 cartridge loaded with a 17.4 gram armor-piercing bullet with a steel core. The 7N33 delivers high penetration thanks to its steel core and substantial muzzle energy. Used by Russian special operations forces.

68badb6458dbe419740b1520.name: Magpul UCS buttstock (Black)
68badb6458dbe419740b1520.description: A telescopic buttstock designed for installation on 1913 Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Magpul. Black version.

68badc0366a72211fe004bc7.name: Magpul UCS Stock Cheek Riser
68badc0366a72211fe004bc7.description: A cheek rest for the Universal Carbine Stock. Manufactured by Magpul.

68badf5030572e90770cd688.name: M590 Precision Reflex Scope Mount
68badf5030572e90770cd688.description: A Weaver rail for the Mossberg 590 shotgun, installed on the receiver. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

68bb25270e48a3afd7071216.name: AR-15 Magpul ACS Carbine stock (Black)
68bb25270e48a3afd7071216.description: A quick-detach buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines with a mil-spec telescoping tube, manufactured by Magpul Original Equipment. The frame design prevents binding and accidental release of the locking lever, while the standard-thickness rubber buttpad reduces slipping on armor or gear. Black version.

68bb2a3831ee03fbc00931e6.name: AR-15 Magpul ACS Carbine stock (FDE)
68bb2a3831ee03fbc00931e6.description: A quick-detach buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines with a mil-spec telescoping tube, manufactured by Magpul Original Equipment. The frame design prevents binding and accidental release of the locking lever, while the standard-thickness rubber buttpad reduces slipping on armor or gear. Flat Dark Earth version.

68be93d19bae3db9c5005b19.name: TKPD 9.3x64 570mm barrel
68be93d19bae3db9c5005b19.description: A 570mm barrel for the TKPD 9.3x64mm assault carbine.

68bedc0365e7dcf94f0cb0fc.name: L3Harris AN/PEQ-15 tactical device (Black)
68bedc0365e7dcf94f0cb0fc.description: The Advanced Target Pointer Illuminator Aiming Laser (ATPIAL) produced by L3 Technologies is a rugged, combat-proven and easy-to-use aiming system with integrated infrared and visible aim lasers as well as an infrared illuminator. Black version.

68bedd86191bb52a5605af8e.name: Mirror glasses (Green)
68bedd86191bb52a5605af8e.description: Mirror glasses with green lenses. Nature.

68bede1d233f2c935b0eda02.name: Shutter glasses (Blue)
68bede1d233f2c935b0eda02.description: Blue shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.

68bede2876e02b9e340ef10f.name: Shutter glasses (Green)
68bede2876e02b9e340ef10f.description: Green shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.

68bede2fd6da72c13f03db91.name: Shutter glasses (Red)
68bede2fd6da72c13f03db91.description: Red shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.

68bede355f1439bc3c0bf814.name: Shutter glasses (White)
68bede355f1439bc3c0bf814.description: White shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.

68bede896b0736bebc012ad7.name: Sunglasses (Deal With It)
68bede896b0736bebc012ad7.description: A classic 2010 internet meme brought to life in eyewear form. Throw these on and never remove them after.

68beded9233f2c935b0eda04.name: Figley sunglasses
68beded9233f2c935b0eda04.description: Limited edition sunglasses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.

68bedee076e02b9e340ef111.name: Figley sunglasses (Green)
68bedee076e02b9e340ef111.description: Limited edition sunglasses with green lenses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.

68bedeedd6da72c13f03db93.name: Figley sunglasses (Red)
68bedeedd6da72c13f03db93.description: Limited edition sunglasses with red lenses. People used to camp in lines for those, but you got them easy.

68bedfa56b0736bebc012ad9.name: Wrestling Legend mustache
68bedfa56b0736bebc012ad9.description: They say this mustache is enough to become the truest legend of the ring.

68bedfdd233f2c935b0eda06.name: Hussar mustache
68bedfdd233f2c935b0eda06.description: A mustache for the real hussars. Or barbershop goers.

68bee0ee79c8186398098e6b.name: Work Peak training mask
68bee0ee79c8186398098e6b.description: A training mask in a black color.

68bee0fac89ccaee060c81d4.name: Work Peak training mask (Gym Duty)
68bee0fac89ccaee060c81d4.description: A training mask in a green color.

68bee1066b0736bebc012adb.name: Work Peak training mask (Gray)
68bee1066b0736bebc012adb.description: A training mask in a gray color.

68bee20bede5c8489f08e1b1.name: Work Peak training mask (Sharky)
68bee20bede5c8489f08e1b1.description: A training mask with a sharky smile.

68bee21213febe37b20e7e11.name: Work Peak training mask (Yellow)
68bee21213febe37b20e7e11.description: A training mask with some bright elements.

68bee22e79c8186398098e6d.name: DevTaс Samurai Menpo Mask
68bee22e79c8186398098e6d.description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac.

68bee238a48c3c320808abc4.name: DevTaс Samurai Menpo Mask (Gold)
68bee238a48c3c320808abc4.description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. Gold color version.

68bee23f6b0736bebc012add.name: DevTaс Samurai Menpo Mask (Purple)
68bee23f6b0736bebc012add.description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. Purple version.

68bee246ede5c8489f08e1b3.name: DevTaс Samurai Menpo Mask (White)
68bee246ede5c8489f08e1b3.description: A Japanese style mask by DevTac. White version.

68bee28f79c8186398098e6f.name: Champion's helmet
68bee28f79c8186398098e6f.description: A painted helmet. Part of the Champion set.

68bee2b431902bb4d90c3a2a.name: LBT-1961A Load Bearing Chest Rig (AOR1)
68bee2b431902bb4d90c3a2a.description: A tactical load-bearing system designed to carry magazines, grenades, and special equipment, while using low-profile body armor. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading. AOR1 version for the true Seals.

68bee2ccd6da72c13f03db95.name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Sand)
68bee2ccd6da72c13f03db95.description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in a desert-style camouflage.

68bee2d9af253218c00ebbb4.name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Green Stripes)
68bee2d9af253218c00ebbb4.description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in a green camouflage.

68bee2e0ede5c8489f08e1b5.name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Mesh Spray)
68bee2e0ede5c8489f08e1b5.description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted with a mesh pattern for better camouflage.

68bee2e876e02b9e340ef113.name: HighCom Striker ULACH IIIA helmet (Coyote Stripes)
68bee2e876e02b9e340ef113.description: A combat helmet with the ears and back of the head protection, manufactured by HighCom. Spray painted in coyote color for better camouflage.

68beef31a3433485d30d5ae1.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Alien)
68beef31a3433485d30d5ae1.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material. For the fans of horror movies and orange cats.

68beef6ca3433485d30d5ae3.name: Cold Fear infrared balaclava (Typhon)
68beef6ca3433485d30d5ae3.description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material. Made for perfect pictures.

68bf405779c8186398099017.name: Peltor TEP-300 tactical earplug (Coyote Brown)
68bf405779c8186398099017.description: A special in-ear headset for communication and hearing protection. Manufactured by 3M Peltor. Coyote Brown version.

68c14b734a7e0bada00f8fd4.name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Green)
68c14b734a7e0bada00f8fd4.description: A green TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.

68c15a033173b556890b5959.name: 7.62x25mm TT M855A1
68c15a033173b556890b5959.description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 4 gram M855A1 armor-piercing bullet. Neat.

68c15b4bb30038a118088bd6.name: 7.62x25mm TT M856A1
68c15b4bb30038a118088bd6.description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 3.6 gram M856A1 armor-piercing tracer bullet. Tracer color: Red.

68c15f77ed3d7df9220debd6.name: 7.62x25mm TT M995
68c15f77ed3d7df9220debd6.description: A 7.62x25mm TT cartridge fitted with a Western 3.4 gram M995 armor-piercing bullet. Neat.

68c165f1903341d88b092b2a.name: Cardinal apartment key
68c165f1903341d88b092b2a.description: A key to an apartment in a luxury residential complex. These apartments once housed TerraGroup's senior executives.

68c16b9ab6b75a8a480520a6.name: Custom Guns NL545 (DI) 5.45x39 assault rifle
68c16b9ab6b75a8a480520a6.description: A Russian assault rifle that combines the ergonomics of the AR-15 platform with the widely available 5.45x39mm cartridge. Manufactured by Custom Guns. This variant uses a bolt carrier group in a direct gas impingement configuration.

68c16e84fc90c174e50de1a8.name: NL545 (DI) 5.45x39 upper receiver
68c16e84fc90c174e50de1a8.description: An upper receiver for the direct impingement NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices.

68c16edf83e2d814b0093f76.name: NL545 (DI) 5.45x39 16.3 inch barrel
68c16edf83e2d814b0093f76.description: A 16.3 inch (415mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the direct impingement NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c16f15efac701f800dfd36.name: NL545 charging handle
68c16f15efac701f800dfd36.description: A standard charging handle for NL545 series carbines and assault rifles. Manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c16f6883e2d814b0093f7a.name: AR-15 SLR Rifleworks Sentry 7 gas block
68c16f6883e2d814b0093f7a.description: A low-profile gas block that replaces the factory gas tube collar on AR-10/AR-15 family carbines and rifles. Manufactured by SLR Rifleworks.

68c16fcffc90c174e50de1ae.name: AR-15 DLG Tactical DLG-138 pistol grip (Black)
68c16fcffc90c174e50de1ae.description: The DLG-138 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 systems. Manufactured by DLG Tactical. Black version.

68c16fe183e2d814b0093f7c.name: AR-15 DLG Tactical DLG-138 pistol grip (FDE)
68c16fe183e2d814b0093f7c.description: The DLG-138 pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 systems. Manufactured by DLG Tactical. Flat Dark Earth version.

68c17005ba442c8112076088.name: AR-15 Custom Guns buffer tube
68c17005ba442c8112076088.description: An AR-15 mil-spec buffer tube for installation of various telescopic buttstocks. Manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c1701cba442c811207608b.name: AR-15 Custom Guns buffer tube (FDE)
68c1701cba442c811207608b.description: An AR-15 mil-spec buffer tube for installation of various telescopic buttstocks. Manufactured by Custom Guns. Flat Dark Earth version.

68c1707983e2d814b0093f7e.name: AR-15 Custom Guns 10.5 inch M-LOK handguard
68c1707983e2d814b0093f7e.description: The Custom Guns 10.5 inch handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

68c170e383e2d814b0093f87.name: AR-15 Custom Guns 14 inch M-LOK handguard
68c170e383e2d814b0093f87.description: The Custom Guns 14 inch handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.

68c2940aecc41cc5490bd40e.name: Custom Guns NL545 (GP) 5.45x39 assault rifle
68c2940aecc41cc5490bd40e.description: A Russian assault rifle that combines the ergonomics of the AR-15 platform with the widely available 5.45x39mm cartridge. Manufactured by Custom Guns. This variant uses a bolt carrier group in a short-stroke gas piston configuration.

68c294360f5ebd68290d6c16.name: NL545 (GP) 5.45x39 upper receiver (FDE)
68c294360f5ebd68290d6c16.description: An upper receiver for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns. Equipped with a mount for attaching additional devices. Flat Dark Earth version.

68c294750f5ebd68290d6c1c.name: NL545 (GP) 5.45x39 16.5 inch barrel
68c294750f5ebd68290d6c1c.description: A 16.5 inch (420mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c294800f5ebd68290d6c20.name: NL545 (GP) 5.45x39 11.5 inch barrel
68c294800f5ebd68290d6c20.description: A 11.5 inch (292mm) 5.45x39mm barrel for the short-stroke gas piston NL545 assault rifle manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c294b9eb59c46bf6070536.name: AR-15 Lantac Dragon 5.56x45 muzzle brake
68c294b9eb59c46bf6070536.description: The Dragon muzzle brake by Lantac is designed for installation on 5.56x45mm weapon systems. Reduces recoil and counters the muzzle climb.

68c2989dc9061bb2f50478f6.name: NL545 10.5 inch M-LOK handguard (FDE)
68c2989dc9061bb2f50478f6.description: The Custom Guns 10.5 inch handguard for NL545 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories. Flat Dark Earth version.

68c2a99647eb77c6310b170f.name: NL545 gas block
68c2a99647eb77c6310b170f.description: An adjustable gas block designed for NL545 series carbines and assault rifles. Manufactured by Custom Guns.

68c721ef980898142c0b3c5a.name: Station 14-4 KORD Arshavin K. pass (Damaged)
68c721ef980898142c0b3c5a.description: This pass for Station 14-4 KORD is issued to K. Arshavin. It appears to have lain unprotected for a long time and may be damaged.

68c725b516027530a50f0d4b.name: Flash drive for ARRS station
68c725b516027530a50f0d4b.description: A flash drive containing data recorded in the ARRS station server room. It's best to return it to Mechanic.

68c944200bf756126e00d801.name: Ref's Cache I
68c944200bf756126e00d801.description: A trophy for participating in Season 1 of the BattlePass. Rumor has it that it’s made up of items personally selected by Ref. Designed for true gladiators and can only be opened within the Arena.

68c954d8ecbf3abc9907ee9b.name: Ref's Cache II
68c954d8ecbf3abc9907ee9b.description: A trophy for participating in Season 1 of the BattlePass. Another crate assembled by Ref, filled with various gear to help endure the hardships of life in Tarkov. Can only be opened in the Arena, under Ref’s watchful eye.

68caaa93269e10396503acf6.name: AR-15 5.56x45 Centurion Arms Mk12 18 inch barrel
68caaa93269e10396503acf6.description: An 18 inch (457mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Manufactured by Centurion Arms.

68caabc3f42a4476cf0be2a6.name: AR-15 5.56x45 Centurion Arms Mk12 16 inch barrel
68caabc3f42a4476cf0be2a6.description: A 16 inch (406mm) barrel for AR-15 platform weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo. Manufactured by Centurion Arms.

68caabebc71156cf470bc186.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex M84 Gas Buster Charging Handle
68caabebc71156cf470bc186.description: The M84 Gas Buster charging handle for use with AR-15 platform rifles, equipped with the Military Big Latch. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

68caac02269e10396503acfa.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex Mk12 Gen.1 Flip-Up Front Sight Gas Block
68caac02269e10396503acfa.description: A gas block with an integrated foldable front sight for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

68caac14f42a4476cf0be2aa.name: AR-15 Sierra Precision SPR pistol grip
68caac14f42a4476cf0be2aa.description: The polymer SPR Handgrip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 pistol grips. Manufactured by Sierra Precision.

68caac28f42a4476cf0be2ac.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Round Carbon 12 inch handguard
68caac28f42a4476cf0be2ac.description: The 12 inch GEN III Round Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

68caac360bfe742288085e16.name: AR-15 KAC Free Float Rifle RAS 12 inch handguard
68caac360bfe742288085e16.description: A quad-rail 12 inch handguard for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.

68caac500bfe742288085e1e.name: AR-15 Allen Engineering SPR Brake 5.56x45
68caac500bfe742288085e1e.description: The SPR muzzle brake for the AR-15 platform. Manufactured by Allen Engineering.

68caac63269e10396503acfc.name: Allen Engineering SPR Brake thread protector
68caac63269e10396503acfc.description: A thread protector for the SPR Brake, manufactured by Allen Engineering.

68caac96933990601c07f476.name: AR-15 Allen Engineering SPR Collar suppressor mount
68caac96933990601c07f476.description: A special AR-15 barrel mount required for installation of Allen Engineering suppressors. Manufactured by Allen Engineering.

68caacb4c8ac87b10507c5a6.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III SPR Top Rail
68caacb4c8ac87b10507c5a6.description: A rifle length Picatinny top rail designed for installation on Precision Reflex GEN III Round handguards. Bridges the handguard and upper receiver. Manufactured by Precision Reflex.

68caacc7933990601c07f479.name: A.R.M.S. #22 30mm ring scope mount
68caacc7933990601c07f479.description: A.R.M.S. #22 is a universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails.

68caace5f42a4476cf0be2b4.name: A.R.M.S. #22 ring cap
68caace5f42a4476cf0be2b4.description: A top ring cap for the A.R.M.S. #22 mount.

68caacf7c8ac87b10507c5a9.name: A.R.M.S. #22 Tactical Ring Rail mount
68caacf7c8ac87b10507c5a9.description: A universal rail mount for installation of various red dot sights or tactical equipment on the A.R.M.S. #22 optic mount, installed as replacement for standard ring cap.

68caad12269e10396503acfe.name: Allen Engineering AEM-5 5.56x45 sound suppressor
68caad12269e10396503acfe.description: The Allen Engineering AEM-5 5.56x45/.223 sound suppressor. Can only be installed on compatible Allen Engineering muzzle devices, and also requires a proprietary SPR Collar on the barrel.

68caad70269e10396503ad00.name: A.R.M.S. #40 Flip-Up Rear Sight
68caad70269e10396503ad00.description: A flip-up rear sight manufactured by A.R.M.S. Inc.

68caad7f933990601c07f47c.name: Leupold Mark 4 MR/T TS-30A2 2.5-8x36 30mm riflescope
68caad7f933990601c07f47c.description: Precise, accurate, durable and dependable - the Mark 4 MR/T TS-30A2 rifle scope. The model provides 2.5-8x magnification giving you a clear idea of the actual size of the targeted object.

68cc09872bdcc15c010c2668.name: Station 14-4 KORD Arshavin K. pass (Restored)
68cc09872bdcc15c010c2668.description: This restored pass should now be able to unlock Station 14-4 KORD.

68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47.name: AR-15 Precision Reflex GEN III Round Carbon 12 inch handguard (FDE)
68cc2ae66e59cb54f4054f47.description: The 12 inch GEN III Round Carbon handguard for AR-15 systems. Manufactured by Precision Reflex. Flat Dark Earth version.

68d152b9915f131d4e05ee6c.name: Voevoda's audio recorder
68d152b9915f131d4e05ee6c.description: An old voice recorder that, apparently, was used by Voevoda himself.

68d159d46c606e46b605094d.name: Armasight N-15 Swing Arm #194
68d159d46c606e46b605094d.description: A mounting system designed to install the N-15 series night vision goggles to Dovetail type helmet mounts. Manufactured by Armasight.

68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786.name: Miller Bros. Blades M-2 Tactical Sword (Brown)
68d16e9f2711340d6b0d4786.description: The "M-2" short tactical sword, manufactured by Miller Bros. Blades. Brown vesion.

68d271fc17de6a40270d5657.name: Moreman's phone
68d271fc17de6a40270d5657.description: A personal phone belonging to one of the Bogatyr squad members. Some data may still remain on it.

68d2f09fb350a6169f04bea9.name: Note for Kozlov
68d2f09fb350a6169f04bea9.description: A threatening note left on the door.

68d2f1318c12620073059930.name: Note from the repair shop
68d2f1318c12620073059930.description: A crumpled note stained with machine oil.

68d2f302be7c1493b90cd3f5.name: Note with a warning
68d2f302be7c1493b90cd3f5.description: A note from a certain Nagano'98.

68d2f3375f98276b7503c32e.name: Note with an address
68d2f3375f98276b7503c32e.description: A note from Reshala's crew mentioning Kozlov's address.

68d2f400be7c1493b90cd3f7.name: The Ninth Circle Issue #14
68d2f400be7c1493b90cd3f7.description: An issue featuring a story about the unexpected PMC rescue.

68d2f44df63f06b7590ce30e.name: The Ninth Circle Issue #19
68d2f44df63f06b7590ce30e.description: An issue featuring a story about the mysterious Mushroom Picker.

68d2f4aff8817df4690db3d1.name: Unsealed envelope
68d2f4aff8817df4690db3d1.description: A postal envelope without a letter, taken from a courier and unsealed immediately.

68d2f4fc17b59ead010894b6.name: Letter from Reshala's bunkhouse
68d2f4fc17b59ead010894b6.description: A letter taken from courier Pasha by Reshala’s people.

68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab.name: Newspaper clipping with a photo of Anastasia
68d2f56eb350a6169f04beab.description: It seems Kozlov left a message on the back of the photograph.

68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b.name: Tarkov Herald newspaper with article by A. Mikhailova
68d2f6352ca1a737d107b84b.description: This issue features an article on the preparation of an important investigation by the journalist A. Mikhailova.

68d2f69e91c2fa84e2044a08.name: First piece of code note
68d2f69e91c2fa84e2044a08.description: Someone tore a note containing a number or code. Without the other half, it’s useless.

68d2f6dbf8817df4690db3d3.name: Second piece of code note
68d2f6dbf8817df4690db3d3.description: The second half of the note contains only two digits. It seems to be a radio frequency or some kind of code.

68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d.name: BEAR note from the outpost behind Ultra
68d2f7334aae290cf704e36d.description: Someone left their notes at the Gnezdo outpost.

68d2f77e5f98276b7503c330.name: Map with triangulated signal
68d2f77e5f98276b7503c330.description: One of the BEARs in the Gnezdo camp clearly tried to triangulate Bogatyr squad's signal. According to the map, the signal came from the eastern part of the nature reserve.

68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f.name: Voevoda's photo with a cultist mark
68d2f9164aae290cf704e36f.description: Someone circled Voevoda with a marker and left instructions for the cultists on the back.

68d2f96e0c834c20c00a81d8.name: Note mentioning Prapor
68d2f96e0c834c20c00a81d8.description: The note mentions Yastreb and preparations for the ambush on the Bogatyr squad. It seems Prapor was somehow involved in the operation.

68d2f9bd2ca1a737d107b84d.name: Note mentioning General
68d2f9bd2ca1a737d107b84d.description: This cultists' note mentions the General, as well as the Lighthouse Warden.

68d2fa018c12620073059932.name: Leshy's orders
68d2fa018c12620073059932.description: A note containing an order from a commander known as Leshy.

68d2fa3abe7c1493b90cd3f9.name: Assistant's notes on Group #12
68d2fa3abe7c1493b90cd3f9.description: The note mentions experiments on central nervous system stability, conducted on human subjects.

68d2fa6d4aae290cf704e371.name: Assistant's notes on Group #3
68d2fa6d4aae290cf704e371.description: According to the note, the test subjects were deliberately driven to psychosis.

68d2fa9b691b7c7b34046367.name: Assistant's notes on Group #8
68d2fa9b691b7c7b34046367.description: The note describes experiments aimed at altering the test subjects' biological clocks.

68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c.name: Assistant's notes on Group #3 and Group #10
68d2fac7c8305ec7c900296c.description: It seems that during the experiments in The Labyrinth, TerraGroup couldn’t dispose of the test subjects’ bodies fast enough.

68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b.name: Assistant's notes on TG-Vi-24 test subjects
68d2faf191c2fa84e2044a0b.description: A note in which the lab assistant reports on the condition of the test subjects involved in project TG-Vi-24.

68d2fc914aae290cf704e373.name: Letter from the mailbox
68d2fc914aae290cf704e373.description: A letter from Kozlov that has been sitting in the mailbox.

68d2fd018c12620073059934.name: Letter from Kozlov's room
68d2fd018c12620073059934.description: A letter from Kozlov's room that he never managed to send.

68d2fd582ca1a737d107b84f.name: Leshy's diary
68d2fd582ca1a737d107b84f.description: Notes from Leshy, detailing his mapping of The Labyrinth and reports on events following the assault.

68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5.name: Labyrinth facility research report
68d2fdbbf8817df4690db3d5.description: Voronenko's report details the experiments TerraGroup conducted on humans in The Labyrinth.

68d301e75f98276b7503c332.name: FSB report
68d301e75f98276b7503c332.description: The report details FSB monitoring of Chepyga. Someone added a handwritten note to it.

68d302814aae290cf704e375.name: Bogatyr squad operations report
68d302814aae290cf704e375.description: The documents describe several operations carried out by the Bogatyr squad.

68d3037c91c2fa84e2044a0d.name: Hostage evacuation report from Voevoda
68d3037c91c2fa84e2044a0d.description: The report details how Voevoda conducted the hostage rescue operation at the Tarbank branch.

68d3041818d70f97e704ad7b.name: Agent network deployment report
68d3041818d70f97e704ad7b.description: The report from The Unheard states that their agents have already infiltrated government structures in multiple countries and hold influence beyond Russia.

68d3054f0c834c20c00a81da.name: Moreman's personal file
68d3054f0c834c20c00a81da.description: The file notes Moreman’s service locations and personality traits.

68d3059318d70f97e704ad7f.name: Voevoda's personal file
68d3059318d70f97e704ad7f.description: According to the file, Voevoda has a very impressive service record.

68d305c35f98276b7503c336.name: Taran's personal file
68d305c35f98276b7503c336.description: The file shows that Taran is younger than the other members of the squad, but still has considerable combat experience.

68d305fc8c12620073059936.name: Strelets' personal file
68d305fc8c12620073059936.description: It seems Strelets possessed exceptional shooting skills, which is why he didn’t change his specialty despite his age.

68d41e65a706eba9a204ed27.name: Armband (Survivor)
68d41e65a706eba9a204ed27.description: The owner of this armband never uncovered the true reasons behind Tarkov’s disaster. But he survived, and in the end that was all that mattered.

68d41f017cb8c03da8079004.name: Armband (To Fall in the Darkness)
68d41f017cb8c03da8079004.description: Those who wear this armband once agreed to a compromise that came at far too high a cost.

68d41fb0a1c275dbaa0798bf.name: Armband (Lighthouse)
68d41fb0a1c275dbaa0798bf.description: This armband marks the PMC operatives who could never break free from their Tarkov past.

68d41fde2937f3f17c04864d.name: Armband (For Humanity)
68d41fde2937f3f17c04864d.description: This armband is worn only by PMCs who managed to uncover the truth in Tarkov’s brutal conditions.

68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3.name: Atomic Defense CQCM ballistic mask (Loui Peeton)
68d54d0525ac8590a8075ac3.description: Atomic Defense's CQCM ballistic mask provides protection against short-range weapons including pistols, shotguns and knives. Comes with a luxury white print.

68d55968ca9935b3f10607a9.name: Fanny pack (Loui Peeton)
68d55968ca9935b3f10607a9.description: A fanny pack made in collaboration with the Loui Peeton fashion house.

68d56685f3d7cd248f0a06d9.name: AK-308 7.62x51 QD sound suppressor
68d56685f3d7cd248f0a06d9.description: A quick-detach sound suppressor for the AK-308 assault rifle, installed on the standard muzzle brake.

68d566b2aa07af2e14059e01.name: AK-74 5.45x39 Magpul PMAG 30 GEN M3 30-round magazine (FDE)
68d566b2aa07af2e14059e01.description: A 30-round polymer Magpul Pmag 30 AK74 GEN M3 magazine for 5.45x39 AK and compatible weapons. Flat dark Earth variant.

68d566f3f3d7cd248f0a06db.name: Magpul UCS buttstock (FDE)
68d566f3f3d7cd248f0a06db.description: A telescopic buttstock designed for installation on 1913 Picatinny rails. Manufactured by Magpul. Flat Dark Earth version.

68d5674bb2573b07dc0d225f.name: AK Zenit RK-3 pistol grip (FDE)
68d5674bb2573b07dc0d225f.description: The RK-3 Klassika anatomic pistol grip features a built-in hermetically sealed battery storage compartment and is designed for installation as a replacement for the standard AK pistol grip. ©Zenit. Flat Dark Earth version.

68d5676f43adc7372a0c8ae0.name: TKPD handguard (FDE)
68d5676f43adc7372a0c8ae0.description: A standard handguard for the TKPD assault carbine. Allows installation of tactical equipment and a bipod. Flat Dark Earth version.

68d65766916a108d7a023c98.name: Armband (Prestige 6)
68d65766916a108d7a023c98.description: An armband for those who want to show their worth.

68d6b3568f9527c33609ce83.name: Shutter glasses (Black)
68d6b3568f9527c33609ce83.description: Black shutter glasses for the true 2010 partygoers. Sucks that you can't see anything with them on.

68da4fa81ddecb1cc0077aee.name: Moreman's dogtag
68da4fa81ddecb1cc0077aee.description: A dogtag belonging to the Bogatyr squad member who has seen hundreds of battles.

68da4fe6f0e86677fe06bfe4.name: Strelets' amulet
68da4fe6f0e86677fe06bfe4.description: Someone fashioned a talisman from a crumpled bullet, either as a keepsake or for luck.

68da51d8f0e86677fe06c9b7.name: Taran's postcard
68da51d8f0e86677fe06c9b7.description: On the back of the postcard, someone wrote: "Love you, waiting for you".

68daab6d1e0a6a3f2f0db279.name: EFT: ARENA baseball cap
68daab6d1e0a6a3f2f0db279.description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.

68dbc04cd700686fbf0d77bd.name: Bogatyrs patch
68dbc04cd700686fbf0d77bd.description: A patch of some special BEAR unit.

68deaddfd149b3493e049c13.name: EFT: ARENA baseball cap
68deaddfd149b3493e049c13.description: A baseball cap with a patch to show everyone your favorite title.

68df97725d4e135b130392c8.name: Survivor poster
68df97725d4e135b130392c8.description: A poster showing a PMC who found his way out of Tarkov. He stayed clear of TerraGroup’s affairs and the roots of the conflict, yet still managed to survive and escape.

68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9.name: To Fall in the Darkness poster
68df97792e6cd294e908d1e9.description: A poster proving that for those who gave in to temptation, there’s only one path left — into the abyss.

68df977e972cf1e1ec072568.name: Lighthouse poster
68df977e972cf1e1ec072568.description: A poster with a lighthouse. Under different circumstances it could have been a symbol of light. Here, it only serves as a reminder of an unpaid debt to a man you can never hide from.

68df9785beba86572e097ce8.name: For Humanity poster
68df9785beba86572e097ce8.description: A poster showing that even the cruelest evil meets its end when it faces a worthy adversary. And on the ruins, humanity will build a new future.

68df9908972cf1e1ec07256a.name: Dogtag BEAR
68df9908972cf1e1ec07256a.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.

68df991142e96f583d042b8a.name: Dogtag BEAR
68df991142e96f583d042b8a.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.

68df991dbeba86572e097ceb.name: Dogtag BEAR
68df991dbeba86572e097ceb.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.

68df9927a38a5e37d80df6c9.name: Dogtag BEAR
68df9927a38a5e37d80df6c9.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.

68df99975d4e135b130392ca.name: Dogtag USEC
68df99975d4e135b130392ca.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner never sought the reasons behind the conflict, but still managed to survive and escape Tarkov against all odds.

68df99a614ca2428b2017cd8.name: Dogtag USEC
68df99a614ca2428b2017cd8.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Stained with the blood of its owner, who fell into darkness chasing an easy way out of Tarkov.

68df99b2f716906506098308.name: Dogtag USEC
68df99b2f716906506098308.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. This one carries a bullet hole straight through the center and a scratched-in strand of barbed wire. Even if its owner escaped Tarkov, he couldn’t escape from himself.

68df99c05d4e135b130392cc.name: Dogtag USEC
68df99c05d4e135b130392cc.description: An army dogtag serving the purpose of quickly identifying the wounded and deceased in combat. Its owner shed light on all of TerraGroup’s secrets in Tarkov. The engraving on the tag symbolizes the inevitable downfall of the ruthless corporation.

68dfc07da7cfeed3e60204e7.name: Armored case
68dfc07da7cfeed3e60204e7.description: A mysterious briefcase, apparently containing a certain "Ticket" out of Tarkov.

68e638cf85c63c556c0272db.name: Unknown device fragment
68e638cf85c63c556c0272db.description: A fragment of a device that apparently activated over Tarkov.

68e6394e658d876c930977b1.name: Unknown device fragment
68e6394e658d876c930977b1.description: A fragment of a device that apparently activated over Tarkov.

68e63a53371639e1e4004b6e.name: Local network hacking device
68e63a53371639e1e4004b6e.description: A device that establishes a remote, secure connection to databases and servers.

68e63b56ad8cba49190ea529.name: Rus Post car key
68e63b56ad8cba49190ea529.description: A key for the Rus Post service vehicle. Most likely opens the trunk as well.

68e63d4794fb983cb7098d2d.name: EMERCOM leaflet
68e63d4794fb983cb7098d2d.description: A flyer that describes the aftermath of the EMP blast and includes official safety recommendations. Such flyers became a common sight across the city after the explosion.

68e63e8d94fb983cb7098d32.name: Note by Item #1156
68e63e8d94fb983cb7098d32.description: A note left by one of the engineers in the workshop next to Item #1156.

68e7d1be6656898e78015bd9.description: A decrypted flash drive containing data belonging to a certain "A.P.". Includes various technical files. The word "Unheard" appears intermittently in the code, but the code itself doesn’t function or run anything.

68e7d35483bb1cc4ac02d8c7.name: Hard drive from Rzhevsky's car
68e7d35483bb1cc4ac02d8c7.description: A hard drive taken from A.P.’s car. Important data may still remain on it.

68e7d904aded99fd1a0624f2.name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Red)
68e7d904aded99fd1a0624f2.description: A red TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.

68e7d984308332889e0b5e71.name: Reprogrammed keycard for A.P.'s apartment lock (Blue)
68e7d984308332889e0b5e71.description: A blue TerraGroup Labs keycard reprogrammed using technical data from A.P.'s flash drive. In theory it might open a hidden room in A.P.'s apartment.

68e95f4fa4a577e907015787.description: It’s unclear which specific bunkhouse this key belongs to. But it should be somewhere on the Customs territory.

68f213f8ea61d1803707cf7a.description: A note from Prapor padded with cash, intended for the soldiers at the port. Hm, Prapor has received far more money than he put into this letter…

68f22172f50ce5aadf0124bf.description: A case with some epic goodies.

68f244ae22c8979ee308f4d8.name: NKVD Finka knife
68f244ae22c8979ee308f4d8.description: A replica of the Soviet combat knife crafted by Norvinsk masters, based on Finnish and Swedish designs. Originally used as a utility tool and, when necessary, in combat, the Finka earned a reputation for simplicity and reliability. Its design provides a comfortable, secure grip. Today, it serves more as a collectible piece than a practical weapon.

68f25a45b2b53abd200b954d.name: Trio poster
68f25a45b2b53abd200b954d.description: A poster depicting the trio who hold Tarkov in a grip of fear.

68f25a8acacd763bbc0e2bf9.name: Ritual poster
68f25a8acacd763bbc0e2bf9.description: A poster depicting a strange ritual. Its creator seems to know the subject from personal experience.

68f25ac501fb9de974058be2.name: Hunters poster
68f25ac501fb9de974058be2.description: A poster depicting soldiers fighting for their lives in Tarkov.

68f25ad7103c5d9d4f02392e.name: Control poster
68f25ad7103c5d9d4f02392e.description: A poster emphasizing the importance of staying in control. Especially when you’re in Tarkov, fighting to survive.

68f25b27abc35769c505f959.name: Raid poster
68f25b27abc35769c505f959.description: This poster was clearly created under the impression of a truly difficult raid in Tarkov.

68f25b4219a2b503d70dc28d.name: Tarkov Metro
68f25b4219a2b503d70dc28d.description: A poster depicting the Tarkov metro as it looks in the current days.

68f25b772605ccea240dd684.name: Armband (Release)
68f25b772605ccea240dd684.description: An exclusive armband for those who waited long enough.

68f25be683ec644ebf046787.name: Armband (Beta)
68f25be683ec644ebf046787.description: An exclusive armband for those who have come almost all the way.

68f25c64b2b53abd200b954f.name: Prapor figurine
68f25c64b2b53abd200b954f.description: This limited Tarko figurine shows Prapor in his best mood.

68f25ce9b2b53abd200b9551.name: Therapist figurine
68f25ce9b2b53abd200b9551.description: This limited Tarko figurine depicts Therapist, ready to save a few unfortunate souls. Or take your money for questionable medical services.

68f25da3b84c6e1f8a09cffb.name: Fence figurine
68f25da3b84c6e1f8a09cffb.description: The limited Tarko figurine is as mysterious as Fence himself.

68f25eba19a2b503d70dc28f.name: Skier figurine
68f25eba19a2b503d70dc28f.description: The creator of this limited Tarko figurine clearly knows Skier well. Otherwise, how could they capture his character so perfectly?

68f25eef19a2b503d70dc291.name: Peacekeeper figurine
68f25eef19a2b503d70dc291.description: Even as a limited Tarko figurine, Peacekeeper seems ready to help and… no, nevermind, he's still just earning money for himself.

68f25f1201fb9de974058be4.name: Mechanic figurine
68f25f1201fb9de974058be4.description: Even in a Tarko figurine depiction, Mechanic remains a true weapons specialist.

68f25f3a5d977110860c3350.name: Ragman figurine
68f25f3a5d977110860c3350.description: Even as a Tarko figurine, Ragman looks every bit the true businessman.

68f25faa22c8979ee308f4da.name: Jaeger figurine
68f25faa22c8979ee308f4da.description: The creator of this figurine captured Jaeger with incredible precision, even conveying the depth of emotion in his eyes.

68f25fdf928cd23ddf0471fb.name: Lightkeeper figurine
68f25fdf928cd23ddf0471fb.description: This limited Tarko figurine shows Tarkov’s Gray Cardinal. Some people know what Lightkeeper looks like only thanks to this figurine.

68f26063b2b53abd200b9553.name: Ref figurine
68f26063b2b53abd200b9553.description: The figurine Ref looks just like the real one, always on the lookout for new fighters for the Arena.

68f2608301fb9de974058be6.name: BTR figurine
68f2608301fb9de974058be6.description: A collectible figurine from an unknown creator, showcasing the best means of transportation in all of Tarkov.

68f260d7b84c6e1f8a09cffd.name: Hideout Cat figurine
68f260d7b84c6e1f8a09cffd.description: This cat was destined to become part of the Tarko figurine collection.

68f26124b84c6e1f8a09cfff.name: Walking Tank figurine
68f26124b84c6e1f8a09cfff.description: A Tarko collectible figurine depicting an operative in a special loadout based on the advice from knowledgeable people. Please do not try this loadout at home.

68f26161b84c6e1f8a09d001.name: Escape figurine
68f26161b84c6e1f8a09d001.description: A Tarko collectible figurine depicting a PMC operative who went through fire, water and copper pipes.

68f261f6928cd23ddf0471fd.name: Mastichin figurine
68f261f6928cd23ddf0471fd.description: A limited Tarko figurine depicting a Tarkov resident.

68f263f099d2172e150d7ff8.name: Baseball cap (EFT Patch)
68f263f099d2172e150d7ff8.description: A baseball cap with a patch. Now everyone will know what you love the most.

68f5f8858d2e1e102a09fc69.description: A case with some epic goodies.

68f611815a50dc814d0b1d0b.description: A case with some epic goodies.

68f611f3dc6100210f074d88.name: Twitch Winter 2025 case (Epic)
68f611f3dc6100210f074d88.description: A case with some epic goodies.

68f77d874ea3f761790e8c05.name: Secure container Alpha-1 with TerraGroup evidence
68f77d874ea3f761790e8c05.description: A small container holding all the documents and audio tapes containing compromising material on TerraGroup. Now they’re guaranteed to reach Mr. Kerman intact.

68f8ccb11cc53ada67036e27.name: Armband (HEAD, EYES Protection)
68f8ccb11cc53ada67036e27.description: A prayer armband made by Gribnik to protect the owner from a stray bullet. It seems that in desperate situations, the fighters don't refuse even "help" like this.

68f8ccbc4c78615ba6079b20.name: Armband (LOOT Prayer)
68f8ccbc4c78615ba6079b20.description: A prayer armband made by Gribnik. It is said to help keep your hard earned trophies during raids for gear and supplies.

68f8ccf06a6869fe97026c3b.name: Armband (SBEU KOMAR Protection)
68f8ccf06a6869fe97026c3b.description: A prayer armband made by Gribnik to protect the owner from a special mosquito subspecies, observed only in the Norvinsk region. Back during Contract Wars, the news posted articles on the Hazardous Environment Combat Special mosquito (abbreviated "SBEU" in Russian), but only a small fraction of the data provided had been scientifically verified.

68f8e04eae031982b00e7aaf.name: Secure container Gamma
68f8e04eae031982b00e7aaf.description: An old secure container Gamma that ended up in Tarkov during the Contract Wars. Despite the battle-scarred appearance, you can damn be sure it will last for many years to come.

68fa8e253666e2fd5b00a626.name: Armored case
68fa8e253666e2fd5b00a626.description: A mysterious briefcase, apparently containing a certain "Ticket" out of Tarkov.

68fb41120760c7891606613c.name: Dogtag BEAR
68fb41120760c7891606613c.description: A BEAR PMC dogtag. Judging by the symbols on it, the owner gave up trying to escape from Tarkov and instead has become one of the true believers.

68fb412b0760c7891606613e.name: Dogtag BEAR
68fb412b0760c7891606613e.description: A BEAR PMC dogtag, the owner of which knows firsthand what Tarkov is all about. The notches mark the moments when the fighter lost all he had, but still kept looking for a way to escape from Tarkov.

68fb4143a854bc7ae80fad3e.name: Dogtag USEC
68fb4143a854bc7ae80fad3e.description: A USEC PMC dogtag. Judging by the symbols on it, the owner gave up trying to escape from Tarkov and instead has become one of the true believers.

68fb4157b280c103230e3b3c.name: Dogtag USEC
68fb4157b280c103230e3b3c.description: A USEC PMC dogtag, the owner of which knows firsthand what Tarkov is all about. The notches mark the moments when the fighter lost all he had, but still kept looking for a way to escape from Tarkov.

68fb9480e6ad35a767066feb.name: Forged In Beta Armband
68fb9480e6ad35a767066feb.description: Forged in Beta armband dedicated to the event hosted by Pestily before the official Escape from Tarkov release.

68fd5aa1c85d51c0130623c9.name: Voevoda's audio recorder
68fd5aa1c85d51c0130623c9.description: An old voice recorder that, apparently, was used by Voevoda himself.

6900a54ae85e475e590c96be.name: Interchange underground utility plan
6900a54ae85e475e590c96be.description: A detailed map of the interchange's underground utilities, used for laying new lines. The mark on the map clearly indicates a spot that could serve as an exit point from the area. Or maybe it's a pirate treasure.

6908edf0a99bfa6b670f825f.name: Sacred Amulet from the abandoned factory
6908edf0a99bfa6b670f825f.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

6908ef18d3e8386fcc04ac77.name: Sacred Amulet from the mysterious room
6908ef18d3e8386fcc04ac77.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

6908ef2267e0b25ac409e8a9.name: Sacred Amulet from room 314
6908ef2267e0b25ac409e8a9.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

6908ef28e594d0dd30029936.name: Sacred Amulet from RB-VO
6908ef28e594d0dd30029936.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

6908ef2f7dbe02178d0c110b.name: Sacred Amulet from RB-PKPM
6908ef2f7dbe02178d0c110b.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

6908ef62000c157bfb0a3b85.name: Sacred Amulet from RB-BK
6908ef62000c157bfb0a3b85.description: An amulet used by the cultists in their rituals. It seems they forgot to return it to Lightkeeper.

690c70a2a1461a01d605a1bd.name: Elvisvista figurine
690c70a2a1461a01d605a1bd.description: The creator of this Tarko figurine depicted someone from the past, when life in Tarkov was calmer. It seems the person was an artist, but that's not certain.
